original: Supply Depot in Area

original: §YBuild Supply Depot§!
translation: §Y建立补给站§!

original:
Building a Supply Depot in $PROV|Y$ will cost $COST|Y$ £mil£ and gives the following effect for all friendly armies in the $AREA|Y$ area:
Counts as owned territory when determining Reinforcements
$MOD$

The Supply Depot will be in operation until $DATE|Y$ or until an enemy occupies or takes the province.
translation:
在$PROV|Y$建造补给站将花费$COST|Y$ £mil£，并对所有在$AREA|Y$地区内的友军提供如下效果：
在增援时视为己方领土。
$MOD$

补给站将在$DATE|Y$或该省份被敌军占领时失效。

original: §RYou have already built a Supply Depot in this Area§!\n
translation: §R你已经在这个地区建立了一个补给站了！§!\n

original: §RYou can only build Supply Depots in provinces controlled by you, your subjects, overlord or war allies.§!\n
translation: §R你只能在被你、你的属国、宗主国或战争盟友控制的省份建立补给站§!\n

original: You need $LIMIT|Y%1$ Army Professionalism to build Supply Depots (currently $VAL|R%1$).\n

§Y补给站§!
补给站对相同地区内的友军有如下效果：
$MOD$

在该地区建立了补给站的国家：

original: $BUILTBY|Y$ ($PROV$). Expires $EXPIRES|Y$.\n
translation: $BUILTBY|Y$（$PROV$）。于$EXPIRES|Y$失效。\n

original: §RYou need $COST$ £mil£ to build a Supply Depot.§!\n
translation: §R建造一个补给站需要$COST$£mil£。§!\n

original: Show Start Screen
translation: 显示开始界面

original: Toggles whether Start Screen with information and background about your country and the region is shown when starting a new game.
translation: 开关是否在一局新游戏开始时显示有关你的国家和宗教的背景信息的开始界面。

original: §YRefill Garrison§!
translation: §Y补充驻军§!

original: Refill a local garrison with manpower from this army's infantry.\n
translation: 使用这支军队的步兵人力补充本地驻军。\n

original: No active fort in province.
translation: 省份内没有激活的要塞。

original: Fort garrison is already full.
translation: 要塞驻军已经满员。

original: No infantry in selected army.
translation: 选定的军队中没有步兵。

original: Needs $LIMIT|Y%1$ §YArmy Professionalism§! to refill garrisons.
translation: 补充驻军需要$LIMIT|Y%1$§Y陆军职业度§!。

original: Do not have the ability to refill garrisons.
translation: 没有补充驻军的能力。

original: Yearly Army Professionalism
translation: 年度陆军职业度

original: May Build Supply Depots
translation: 可以建造补给站

original: May Refill Garrison
translation: 可以补充驻军

original: Regain Manpower When Disbanding
translation: 解散时可以获得人力

original: General Cost
translation: 陆军将领花费

original: Reduced Morale Damage Taken By Reserves
translation: 减少后备军的士气伤害

original: Combat Bonus
translation: 战斗加成

original: Do not show again
translation: 不再显示

original: You can change this setting in §YOptions§! before you start a game.
translation: 你可以在游戏开始之前于§Y选项§!中改变这个设置。

original: If shown in the text, the following feature is from $DLC_NAME$.
translation: 如果在文本中显示，则该特性来自$DLC_NAME$。

original: Efficient Tax Farming
translation: 高效的包税制

original: Tax farms are in many ways the most efficient way to exploit the resources of our country. By selling the right to extract profit from various parts of our domain we can be sure of a steady and guaranteed income, while the tax farmer himself has good incentive to make the land yield even more.
translation: 在许多开发我国资源的方法当中，包税制是最有效率的一种。通过有偿授予在我国不同领土上获利的权利，我们可以获得稳定可靠的收入，而包税人本身也更有动力来提升土地的产量。

original: Land Acquisition
translation: 征用土地

original: Through efficient reclamation of previously unused land, and integration of previously unowned land, we are able to much more quickly make a profit even at the periphery of our Sultanate.
translation: 通过征用曾经荒废的和无主的土地，即使在我们苏丹国的边缘地带，我们也可以更快地获利。

original: Lenient Taxation
translation: 宽松的税收

original: An overtaxed subject is one prone to dissent or even rebellion. By easing up the burdens we place on our neighboring states we have gained their gratitude.
translation: 税赋繁重的属国倾向于不忠甚至是叛乱。通过降低我们邻国的负担，我们得到了他们的感激。

original: Trained Horsemanship
translation: 熟练的骑术

original: Few horsemen are as profficient as ours and few horse breeds as reliable and suited for war. We must always actively keep working on our horsemanship, through competitions, training, small raids and even in warfare itself.
translation: 很少有骑手能像我们的骑手一样娴熟，也很少有像我们一样培育得可靠而又适合战斗的马种。我们必须一直通过竞赛、训练、小规模的掠夺甚至战争等手段，持续提升我们的骑术水平。

original: Promoted Culture in Government
translation: 政府中的认同文化

original: Our wise Sultan has chosen to promote those who supported him in the struggle of succession. Through his wise policies an entire region can now prosper.
translation: 我们睿智的苏丹选择提拔那些在继承纷争当中帮助过他的人。通过他英明的政策，整个地区得以繁荣昌盛。

original: Seized Clerical Holdings
translation: 没收教权产业

original: There are a variety of charitable donations and clerical properties in this land that have been granted for the wrong reasons by our predecessors. We must move to reduce the corruption in this system and return the clerical properties to the state, the foremost guardian of what is right and wrong in our country.
translation: 我们的先辈们错误地在这片土地上赐予教会太多的慷慨捐赠和教权产业。我们必须行动起来，减轻这个体制的腐败程度并把这些产业收归给裁决守护者，即国家。

original: Invited Minorities
translation: 受邀请的少数民族

original: Acting as a safe haven for our brothers in faith in an unsafe world we have invited them all to settle within our lands. Here they can build a new life for themselves while contributing to the rise of our state.
translation: 我们邀请身处险地的同宗兄弟来到我们的土地上，为他们提供一个避风港。他们可以于此过上新的生活，并为我们的国家做出贡献。

original: Let us do what we can to realize these ideas!
translation: 让我们尽力而为实现这些理念！

original: Sack of [From.GetCapitalName]
translation: [From.GetCapitalName]之劫

original: Traditionally advancing armies have been expected to supply themselves from what they can plunder in the area they move through. This is often the only way for soldiers to survive in wartime as payments from the [Root.GovernmentName] treasury can rarely be brought in a timely manner to the men. In fact, by paying retroactively many also avoid the strain of paying for the fallen.\nAs [From.GetCapitalName] fell it was therefore expected that our soldiers be allowed to loot the city to enrich themselves. What was less expected was the total and utter destruction of the city that took place. Refusing to follow orders our men descended upon the helpless burghers, doing despicable things and ruining the area for a long time to come.
translation: 通常来讲，行进中的军队会从他们所处的地区来掳掠补给。由于战争时期来自[Root.GovernmentName]的薪饷很难及时下发，这经常是士兵们生存的唯一方式。实际上，这种行为也可以减轻为阵亡将士发饷的负担。\n随着[From.GetCapitalName]的陷落，我们的士兵应当被允许劫掠城市并获利。但我们并没有想到这导致了城市的完全毁灭。我们的士兵们无视纪律，闯入无助的居民家里施以暴行并破坏城区，这持续了很长一段时间。

original: We must punish the perpetrators!
translation: 严惩作奸犯科之人！

original: We need better payment routines and harder discipline!
translation: 改革军饷、严明军纪！

original: Such are the rules of warfare.
translation: 这就是战争的规则。

original: [Root.GetCapitalName] Looted!
translation: [Root.GetCapitalName]已被劫掠！

original: Following the fall of [Root.GetCapitalName], the armies of [From.GetName] have devastated the city and the surrounding countryside.
translation: 随着[Root.GetCapitalName]的陷落，[From.GetName]的军队摧毁了城市和周边的乡村。

original: Barbarians!
translation: 这些野蛮人！

original: The Sack of [Root.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.GetCapitalName]之劫

original: As the city of [Root.GetCapitalName] fell into enemy hands the advancing armies of [From.GetAdjective] embarked on several days of plundering. Inside the city walls a smoldering ruin is all that remain of the once thriving city and the survivors are seeking refuge as far away as they can.
translation: 随着[Root.GetCapitalName]城落入敌军之手，[From.GetAdjective]军队进行了数天的掳掠。在城墙内，曾经兴盛的城市只剩下一座焚烧的废墟，幸存者们正试图远离此处以图避难。

original: Our people will never forget the atrocities of [From.GetName]!
translation: 我们的人民永远不会忘记他们在[From.GetName]的暴行！

original: Delayed Salaries
translation: 延迟发薪

original: The campaign in [enemy_country.GetName] has run into some severe logistical problems. As the season for salary payment draws nearer it is becoming abundantly clear that we will not be able to pay all troops as there is simply no way for the money to get to them on time. Our generals blame constant enemy raids on the baggage train and insist they planned everything in detail, but the problem is now [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s to solve.\nIf we only pay a fraction of our troops many will no doubt desert.\nWe could also choose to pay none of them and tell them to live off the land, but that would likely devastate the entire area.
translation: [enemy_country.GetName]的战役遇到了一些严重的后勤问题。随着发薪的季节临近，由于资金没有时间周转，很明显我们无法将薪饷发给所有的部队。我们的将军们抱怨敌军持续掠夺我们的辎重车队，并坚持他们已经做好了详尽的计划，现在该[Root.Monarch.GetName]来解决问题了。\n如果我们只给一部分部队发薪饷，许多士兵无疑会临阵脱逃。\n我们也可以选择完全不给他们发饷，让他们就地征集，但这很可能使整个地区荒废。

original: We must pay the elite troops
translation: 我们必须给精锐部队发饷

original: Let them live off the land
translation: 让他们就地解决吧

original: The many jobs of a Soldier
translation: 士兵从事副业

original: Prolonged peacetime and changes in the economy has lead to many of our salaried soldiers no longer considering the pensions we pay them sufficient. An increasing number of them have turned to other daily work such as shopkeeping or craftsmanship, earning a better living in their city homes.\nWhile this can stimulate the local economy it does mean that these troopers are no longer maintaining, or practicing with, the equipment we have provided them. In order to stop this trend we would have to increase their pay substantially.
translation: 长时间的和平和经济形势的变化导致我们的许多士兵开始认为薪水不够，因此越来越多地转而寻求其他日常工作，诸如经商或手工业，以图在他们居住的城市过上更好的生活。\n虽然这样刺激了当地经济的发展，但同时也意味着这些士兵不再维护和熟悉军械了。为了阻止这种趋势，我们需要充分提高他们的薪饷标准。

original: They must not be allowed to do dabble in the roles other occupations.
translation: 不允许他们涉及其他领域。

original: We will allow it for now.
translation: 暂时让他们这么做吧。

original: Foreign Talent
translation: 外国人才

original: Our drillmasters stand in awe of the [professional_country.GetAdjective] armies and the methods they have so successfully employed to organize army routines and practices. We are not the only ones who have taken notice, [professional_country.GetAdjective] officers are in high demand in many countries. Of course the [professional_country.GetStateForm] of [professional_country.GetName] does not take kindly upon those of its officers that would seek employment abroad and would likely disapprove if we tried to entice any subject of theirs.\nThat does not mean, however, that there are not individuals who would be interested in such a career opportunity, if we made it worth their while.
translation: 我们的教官敬畏[professional_country.GetAdjective]的军队和他们组织军队日常生活和训练的方式。不只有我们注意到了这一点，还有许多国家也大量雇佣来自[professional_country.GetAdjective]的军官。当然[professional_country.GetName]的[professional_country.GetStateForm]并不鼓励他们的军官到国外就职，也会抵触我们对这些人的诱惑。\n但这并不意味着我们开出合适的价码，军官们也不会对就职邀请感兴趣。

original: Hire [professional_country.GetAdjective] officers
translation: 雇佣[professional_country.GetAdjective]的军官。

original: Let us continue to rely on our own people.
translation: 坚定不移走我国特色强军之路。

original: Infiltration of [From.GetName]
translation: 对[From.GetName]的渗透

original: Our military professionalism has made our retired deserting officers very attractive to the other countries in the region. So much so that they are not properly vetting the defectors they recruit.\nOur spymaster reports that we have managed to get a number of agents into the service of the [From.GetAdjective] [From.GetStateForm].
translation: 我们专业的军队使我们的退役军官对许多邻国很有吸引力，以至于他们并没有对这些背叛者进行多少审查。\n我们的间谍首脑报告我们成功将一些间谍渗透进了[From.GetAdjective][From.GetStateForm]的军队。

original: Excellent...
translation: 非常好……

original: Wargames
translation: 军事演习

original: Our generals have asked us for funds to conduct a massive military field exercise to re-enact one of the great [Root.GetOldEra] battles. This would be quite costly, and take up a lot of their time, but they insist it would both provide valuable insights to them, be a good way to drill the troops and perhaps intimidate our neighbors as well.
translation: 我国的将军申请经费举办一次大型的军事演习来重现[Root.GetOldEra] 中的一场大战。 这会花费不少资金和将军们的时间，但他们坚持这不仅将为他们提供宝贵的经验，而且可以成为一种有效的操练军队方式，也许还能震慑我们的邻居。

original: Allow them to re-enact the battle.
translation: 允许他们重演那场战斗。

original: We will soon give them a real war to try their theories in.
translation: 我们很快会给他们一场真正的战争来让他们尝试那些理论。

original: Private Contractors
translation: 私人承包商

original: Due to lack of permanent structures many armies rely on private contractors to provide everything from equipment to entire regiments. Usually these entrepreneurs receive a sum in advance that they can then use to procure what the army needs on short notice. This often works well to meet the swiftly changing needs of our troops during campaigns, but there are those that would take advantage of the system.\nAs our armies in [enemy_country.GetName] advance deeper into enemy territory there are increasing reports of corruption and unwarranted cooperation between our logistical officers and local entrepreneurs. If we are to maintain efficiency we must root out these practices but in the short run we will risk disrupting the system even more by fighting the corruption.
translation: 由于缺少长设架构，许多军队依靠私人承包商来提供从装备到兵源的许多东西。通常这些承包商会收到一笔预付款以便应对军队的临时要求。这通常可以有效地应对我们军队随战役进程而变化的需求，但也有人会试图从这种体制当中贪小便宜。\n随着我们的军队深入[enemy_country.GetName]的领土，后勤官员和当地承包商之间的腐败事件和无根据的交易也随之增加。如果我们想保持补给效率，就必须根除这些行为，但短期内我们的补给系统很可能受到干扰。

original: Root out the rot!
translation: 根除腐败者！

original: We will have to let it be.
translation: 放任自流。

original: An Army Career
translation: 军队生涯

original: With the growth of our professional army, new career opportunities abound for those with ability and ambition. The old [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments], however, still expect to be awarded all the most valuable commissions out of tradition and the centuries during which their lineages have served the [Root.GetStateForm] faithfully.\nSome of our higher officers are now imploring us to open more opportunities for able men to rise in the ranks, while others oppose this vehemently and maintain that there are qualities only blood can assure.
translation: 随着我们专业军队的成长，有能力和野心的人有了更多的机会。但旧的[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]仍然期望从事最有价值的差事，因为这是数世纪来他们的血统为[Root.GetStateForm]忠诚效力的传统。\n我们的一些高级军官请求我们晋升军队中有能力的人，给他们以机会； 另一些则坚决反对并主张有些品质唯有血统才能保障。

original: We must safeguard the ancient traditions of our officer corps.
translation: 我们必须保证我们军官团的古老传统。

original: We can make room for newcomers in the higher parts of the hierarchy.
translation: 我们可以给这些新鲜血液提供一些向上爬的机会。

original: Esprit de Corps
translation: 团队精神

original: The strain, that the military lifestyle puts the men who serve under, can under good circumstances lead to the development of a spirit of belonging and cooperation that greatly strengthens the armed forces. During the recent conflict with [enemy_country.GetName] we have seen clear signs that our troops are working better together and that they have formed strong bonds of loyalty and duty to the [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GetStateForm] that would have seemed hard to imagine just a few years ago.
translation: 紧张的军队生活使服役的人们培养出了一种归属感和合作意识，这极大地强化了我们的军队。在最近与[enemy_country.GetName]的冲突中，我们明显发现部队之间配合默契，并对[Root.GetAdjective][Root.GetStateForm]有着极强的忠诚和使命感，这在几年前还是难以想象的。

original: This is what separates the [Root.GetAdjective] troops from all other.
translation: 这就是[Root.GetAdjective]军队和他国的差距。

original: Lack of Officers
translation: 缺少军官

original: In order to keep a sizable professional army efficient a sufficient number of trained officers are required to carry out the orders and will of the [Root.GetStateForm]. However, the increased demand on quality leadership is not matched by the number of officers on our rolls.\nWith increased demands on quality new officers also take longer to train and are harder to recruit.
translation: 为了保证一支规模可观的职业军队的效率，充足数量的受训军官被要求去执行军事命令和[Root.GetStateForm]的意志。然而，对于优质领袖日益增长的需求并不能和我们的军官数量相匹配。\n而优质的新军官无疑需要更多时间去培养以及更难被招募。

original: Shorten the training.
translation: 缩短培训时间。

original: Increase recruitment.
translation: 增加招募数量。

original: Local Militias
translation: 本地民兵

original: Many military duties are not performed by the professional armies of the [Root.GetStateForm] but rather by local militias based around the cities, castles and forts in the various parts of our country. These militias often know the local area well and provide very good value for money as garrisons, scouts and gatherers of intelligence but their quality as regular troops are very varied to say the least.\nIt has been suggested that we send professional soldiers to at least instruct all militias in the country and that we rely less on them when conducting operations in many areas. This would, according to our generals, lead to an increase in quality and make us less vulnerable to things we cannot control. It would, however, also most likely mean dismissing a great number of our reserve troops.
translation: 许多军事任务并不由[Root.GetStateForm]的职业军队执行，而是由来自国家各地的城市、城堡和要塞的民兵们代劳。这些民兵熟知当地并且从金钱层面来说，民兵作为卫戍部队，侦察兵和智囊团有较高的性价比，但他们的质量如果当做正规来看的话却是不值得一提的。\n有人建议把我们的职业士兵分派到全国各地的民兵组织，他们多多少少能起到统领当地民兵组织的作用，从而减少我们在各地执行军事行动时对他们的依赖。据我们的将军们说，这将会提高我们的军队质量并在不可控事件面前不至于不堪一击。但是，这也很大程度上意味着我们需要解散大量的后备军。

original: We need the militias.
translation: 我们需要民兵。

original: Let us not rely on local abilities.
translation: 我们不能依赖本地武装。

original: Fires of Industry
translation: 工业发展如火如荼

original: The growing needs of our professional army has had a profound effect on the local business in [Root.GetCapitalName]. The manufactories in and around the city can hardly keep up with rising demand and both investors and workers are now flocking from all over our country to [Root.GetName] to expand the business.
translation: 职业化军队的日渐增长的需求，已经对[Root.GetCapitalName]的当地商业起到了深远影响。城市内部和周围的制造厂已经不能满足攀升的需求，而全国的投资者和工人也蜂拥到 [Root.GetName]  进一步扩张商业。

original: The foundries of [Root.GetCapitalName] shall supply the nation!
translation: [Root.GetCapitalName]的铸造厂应当为这个国家供应物资！

original: Growth of Regimental Towns
translation: 军镇发展

original: As the army becomes a way to earn a livelihood for an increasing number of our subjects, the cities that house the army installations and barracks are starting to grow under the supervision of army engineers and renovators. In [Root.GetName] the growth of [Root.GetCapitalName] has come to benefit the entire province.
translation: 随着军队成为我国越来越多臣民的谋生之所，配备了军事设施和军营的城市在陆军工程师和革新者的监督下壮大了起来。在[Root.GetCapitalName]的发展同时也带动了 [Root.GetName] 整个省份的发展。

original: Great.
translation: 很好

original: Treason against [Root.GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry][Root.GetName]
translation: 发生在[Root.GetName]的叛国行径

original: Recruitment is out of necessity something that has to be a somewhat decentralized affair. Often it will be entrusted to [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] in the capital, and then they are responsible to turn up a set number of men in the various provinces under our control.\nThis is a system that to some extent relies on trust as the central government is not involved in the details of countryside mustering, and the only form of control we have are the, often sporadic, inspections the army itself conducts. One such inspection in [cheating_rolls.GetName] has unearthed quite a local scandal. The rolls we have for the area is full of fictional names and nobody seems to know what we could actually muster from the region.
translation: 征募新兵的活动由于本身性质不得不分散在各地进行。它经常被委托给首都的[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] 然后由他们负责在处于我们控制下的不同省份招募一定数量的士兵。\n这个征兵体系依赖于中央政府对地方贵族的信任，因为中央政府往往无法参与乡村地区的征募工作，而我们唯一的控制方式是对军队的行为进行零散的视察。在[cheating_rolls.GetName]的一次视察工作揭开了一起当地丑闻。当地的花名册充满了虚构的名字，而且没有人知道我们究竟可以从当地征募多少士兵。

original: This is unfortunate.
translation: 真是不幸。

original: We must punish the perpetrator and conduct our own survey.
translation: 我们必须惩罚犯罪者然后开展我们自己的调查

original: Proliferation of the Musket
translation: 滑膛枪的普及

original: As firearms have grown commonplace our old regiments of elite troops no longer fills the same function as sharpshooters and pioneers. They have done much to develop our armies over time and they will now be dispersed among our other regiments.
translation: 随着火器成为常见的事物，我们过去的精英军团不再由神射手和先锋队组成。随着时间的流逝他们已经为我们的军队发展做了足够多的事情，如今他们将会被编入新的军团。

original: Ok.
translation: 好的。

original: Hanafi
translation: 哈乃斐派

original: The Hanafi Madhab is named after Abu Hanifa No'man bin Tabet. The school originated in Kufa and is prominent throughout the Persian and Turkic world, including northern India. Though textual sources in the Quran and Hadiths are given preference, Hanafis have an inclusive view of sources and also employ analogy (Qiya), Istihsan and local customs (Urf) in their jurisprudence. Some view it as the most flexible of the schools.
translation: 哈乃斐教派以伊玛目·阿布·哈尼法命名。这个学派起源于库法，并在波斯和突厥世界，甚至包括北印度地区附近传播甚广。尽管古兰经和圣训集的文献更被看重，哈乃斐教派却有着一种对各种文献兼容并蓄的精神，以及他们的法律体系中还采用了类比推理，伊斯提赫桑（嘉纳、决择之意，一种将事情把好的方向考虑的裁决方式）和当地不成文法（欧尔夫，教法范围以外的民俗习惯）。一些人认为它是所有学派中最为包容并蓄的。

original: Hanbali
translation: 罕百里派

original: The Hanbali Madhab is named after Ahmad ibn Hanbal, and champions withholding from any speculative theology, Kalam. Hanbalis maintain that the Quran and Sunnah are the only proper sources of jurisprudence and that they should be interpreted in a literal and traditionalist sense. Though it is accepted as a valid Madhab very few states actively promote the Hanbali school, and it was banned by the Abbasid Caliphs.
translation: 罕百里教派以艾哈迈德·伊本·罕百里命名。该学派拒绝思辨式神学，如凯拉姆学。罕百里学者主张古兰经和圣行是唯一恰当的的法学依据，以及它们应该从传统主义的层面上进行毫无夸张成分的解读。尽管它被认为是一个正统的学派，但很少国家会积极推行罕百里教派，它甚至还曾被阿巴斯王朝禁止过。

original: Maliki
translation: 马立克派

original: The Maliki Madhab is named after Malik Ibn Anas and is prominent in particular throughout North Africa and Iberia. Jurisprudence is primarily based on the work and interpretations of ibn Anas and his student Sahnun as described in the al-Muwatta and the Mudawwanah. One of the foremost centers of learning within the Maliki School is the Great Mosque of Kairouan, near Tunis.
translation: 马立克教派以马立克·本·艾奈斯命名，在北非和伊比利亚地区十分盛行。其法律体系主要基于马立克本人的著作以及在穆瓦塔圣训集还有麦地那法学派概况中他和他的学生赛哈农的解读。马立克教派最重要的中心之一是突尼斯市的大清真寺。

original: Shafi'i
translation: 沙斐仪派

original: The Shafi'i Madhab is named after Imam Al-Shafi'i, and it is prominent in particular among Muslims in Arabia, East Africa and East Asia. It was once the official doctrine of the Seljuk, Ayyubid and Mamluk Sultanates. Unlike other Madhabs the Shafi'i reject Istihsan Istislah as sources of Sharia, instead only relying on what is textually in the Quran or Hadiths.
translation: 沙斐仪教派以穆罕默德·本·伊德里斯·沙斐仪。该教派尤其流行于阿拉伯半岛，东非和东亚地区。它还曾是塞尔柱，阿尤布王朝和马穆鲁克苏丹国的官方学说。不像其它的教派，沙斐仪教派拒绝将伊斯提哈桑（嘉纳、决择之意，一种将事情把好的方向考虑的裁决方式）和伊斯提斯拉赫（活用法律保证公众利益）作为伊斯兰教教法的教法来源，而只依靠古兰经和圣训集的文本内容。

original: Ismaili
translation: 伊斯玛仪派

original: Ismailism is named after Ismai'l ibn Jafar, the successor of Ja'far al-Sadiq, and was the dominant school of faith in the Fatimid Sultanate but has lost much ground since its fall. Ismailism encompasses a number of increasingly divergent branches, such as the Musta'li and the Nizari and in many ways they focus on the esoteric elements of Shiite faith more than the Jafaris or Zaidis.
translation: 伊斯玛仪教派取名自贾法尔·萨迪格的继承人伊斯玛仪·伊本·贾法尔。教派曾是法蒂玛苏丹国的最大学派，但在法蒂玛衰落后便每况愈下。伊斯玛仪派包含着大量的日渐增多的支派，比如穆斯塔里派和尼扎里派。在许多方面，他们比贾法里派和栽德派更关注什叶派的深奥教义。

original: Jafari
translation: 贾法里派

original: The Jafari Madhab is named after Jaf'ar al-Sadiq, the sixth Imam, and it's followers are ‘Twelver' Shias. Twelvers believe that Ali, the successor of Muhammed, was followed by twelve infallible Imams chosen by divine decree. The last of the Imams, al-Mahdi, is expected to return as the savior of mankind, finally enforcing justice and peace in the world.
translation: 贾法里教派取名自贾法尔·萨迪格，也就是第六任伊玛目，其后继为什叶的十二伊玛目派。十二伊玛目派认为穆罕默德的继承人阿里与紧随其后的后继者在内的十二位伊玛目是无谬和免罪的，且都是被神谕选择的人。最后一位伊玛目，马赫迪被期待作为救世主复临人间，让公正与和平充满大地。

original: Zaidi
translation: 宰德派

original: Zaidis are named after Zaid ibn Ali, the grandson of Muhammed's son Ali, and follow his teachings as described in the Majmu' al-Fiqh. Zaidis emphasize justice and human responsibility and descend from those that supported Zaid's original revolt against the Ummayad Caliph. Zaidis entirely reject religious dissimulation as practiced by many Shias and they are prominent in the Yemen highlands.
translation: 栽德派取名自栽德·本·阿里，也就是侯赛因的孙子，其教义遵从栽德在法学汇编中的教诲。宰德派强调公平正义和人类的责任感以及由宰德派对抗伍麦叶哈里发的最初的反叛势力发展而来。如被许多什叶派人士一样，宰德派完全抗拒宗教神秘主义。而栽德派则流行于也门的高地地区。

translation: 当地学者赞助

original: Ghazis
translation: 勇士

original: We have received a number of foreign warriors who have come to join in war against infidel.
translation: 已经有大量的外国战士加入了我们对抗异教徒的战争中。

original: Sufi Shrine
translation: 苏菲派圣地

original: This is the site of the tomb of a prominent Sufi Shiekh and the related Shrine.
translation: 这是一个苏菲派杰出谢赫之墓和相关圣地的选址。

original: Shiite Urbanites
translation: 什叶派市民

original: Urban Shiites from faraway countries have come to settle in this province, facilitating economical growth but also leading to tensions with the locals who sometimes have other traditions.
translation: 来自遥远国家的什叶派市民在这个省定居了下来，促进了经济增长，但也导致了与遵从其他传统当地人的紧张关系。

original: Shiite Settlers
translation: 什叶派迁徙者

original: Shiites from faraway countries have come to settle this province, facilitating growth but also creating tensions with the more traditional local population.
translation: 来自遥远国家的什叶派教徒解决了这个省的问题，促进了经济增长，但也加剧了与当地人的冲突。

original: Influential Sufi
translation: 富有影响力的的苏菲

original: Local society is under the strong influence of a charismatic Sufi. This spiritual leader is far from the direct influence of the Ulema, but he has a strong following here nonetheless, many of whom are turning to Islam for the first time.
translation: 当地在一位富有魅力的苏菲影响下。这位精神领袖的直接影响力远不如远非乌理玛，但他在这里有很多的追随者，许多人第一次皈依伊斯兰教。

original: Religious Orthodoxy Enforced
translation: 强制改信正统

original: We have turned away a local Sufi sheikh from this region, despite him being very influential even among non-Muslims, and enforced a stricter orthodoxy among the local faithful population.
translation: 我们从这个地区赶走了一个当地的苏菲派酋长，尽管他在非穆斯林中很有影响力。并在当地忠实的人群中宣扬了了更为严格的正统观念。

original: Has Invited Religious Scholars.
translation: 已邀请宗教学者。

original: Mutual Respect
translation: 相互尊重

original: State-Court Conflict
translation: 法院的冲突

original: By stepping in and meddling with the courts in this region we have upset the local judges and as a result generated bad will among the population.
translation: 通过介入和干预这个地区的法院，我们已经惹恼了当地的法官，在人群中产生了不好的影响。

original: Playing the Courts
translation: 滥用权力的法庭

original: An unusually unscrupulous merchant has taken to the habit of playing the religious courts for personal benefits, upsetting the order of this area.
translation: 一个不寻常的无良商人已经习惯了在宗教法庭上为个人牟利，扰乱了这个地区的秩序。

original: Upset Sufi Lodges
translation: 愤怒的苏菲神社

original: We have actively persecuted anyone who could be seen as flirting with shiite tendencies in this province and as a result we have greatly infringed on the rights of the local sufi lodges.
translation: 我们积极地迫害任何可能被视为在该省宣扬什叶派的人，结果我们严重侵犯了当地苏菲派的权利。

original: Bent to Social Protest
translation: 回应社会抗议

original: We have responded to local protests led by an influential Mufti by bending to their demands. Reducing tensions at a cost of the local garrison losing face.
translation: 我们对当地的抗议活动作出了回应，妥协于他们的要求，当地受到了一个有影响力的穆夫提的领导。牺牲了当地驻军的面子为代价来减少紧张局势。

original: Social Protests
translation: 社会抗议

original: Social protests in this area have been strengthened by the support of the local religious establishment. Our unwillingness to listen to the protesters regardless has greatly inflamed the involved.
translation: 当地宗教机构的支持加强了这一地区的社会抗议活动。我们不愿意倾听抗议者的意见，这大大激怒了他们。

original: Hampered Growth
translation: 阻碍经济增长

original: The capital city of this province has grown too quickly for the charitable institutions to be able to keep up with the number of poor.
translation: 这个省的省会城市发展太快，慈善机构无法负担如此多的贫困人口。

original: Establishment of new Waqfs
translation: 建立新的圣地

original: To cope with the quick growth of the urban centers of this province we have made a number of new charitable donations, reducing the income of the state but increasing the local ability to deal with the poor.
translation: 为了应对这个省的城市中心的快速发展，我们做了一些新的慈善捐赠，减少了国家的收入，但增加了当地负担穷人的能力。

original: Upkeep of Holy Shrines
translation: 供养神殿

original: It is our duty to pay for the upkeep of the holy shrines under our control. In order to do so we have set aside lands all over our domain for this purpose.
translation: 我们有责任为在我们的控制下为圣祠的维护付费。为了达到这个目的，我们把所有的土地都放在了我们的名下。

original: Renowned Madrasah
translation: 著名的伊斯兰学院

original: The local Madrasah here has grown to be quite renowned, attracting a great number of scholars from the entire region, greatly contributing to the growth of the entire area.
translation: 当地的伊斯兰学院已经发展到相当著名的程度，吸引了这个地区的大量学者，对这个地区的发展做出了巨大贡献。

original: Hampered Expansion of Madrasah
translation: 阻碍伊斯兰学院扩张

original: The local Madrasah here has grown to be quite renowned. Locals have been unable to provide the necessary facilities to support a truly great Madrasah however, which has hampered the potential for growth in the region.
translation: 当地的伊斯兰学院已经变得相当有名了。然而，当地人无法提供必要的设施来支持真正伟大的伊斯兰学校，这降低了该地区的发展潜力。

original: Sought out tomb of Sufi Sheikh
translation: 寻找苏菲酋长的墓

original: Our leader has gained great notoriety from having sought out the tomb of a prominent Sufi Sheikh.
translation: 我们的领袖因寻找著名的苏菲派酋长的坟墓而声名狼藉。

original: Disfavoring Sufis
translation: 不赞成苏菲派

original: Our ruler has refused to give legitimacy to sufi shrines in our country, greatly increasing his support from the established Ulema.
translation: 我们的统治者拒绝给我们国家的苏菲派圣坛合法性，大大增加了他的支持。

original: Empowered Alevis
translation: 授权阿拉维人

original: We have empowered the local Alevis to make conversion of this area quicker and less problematic.
translation: 我们已经授权当地的阿拉维人，使这个区域的传教速度更快且问题更少。

original: Ulema Privileges Infringed
translation: 乌理玛特权被侵犯

original: In order to stem the corruption among the administrators of religious endowments we have had to trample on the rights of the Ulema.
translation: 为了遏制宗教捐赠基金管理人员的腐败，我们不得不触动乌理玛的权利。

original: Corrupt Sadr
translation: 腐败的萨德尔

original: Some of our administrators of religious endowments have been helping themselves to some of the money they are handling, and have used their power to ensure their relatives pay little taxes.
translation: 我们的一些宗教捐赠基金的管理人员一直在帮助他们工作，并借此来偷税漏税。

original: Mutual Respect between the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool]
translation: [Root.GetReligiousSchool]与[school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool]相互尊重

original: There have never been any theological differences worth a real conflict between the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] schools and both customs often exist side by side.\nThe long-lasting cooperation between the [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and the [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] [school_opinion_increase_country.GetAdjective] states has, however, lead to a new era of mutual understanding and respect.
translation: [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 和 [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] 学派之间从没有过任何神学观点的差异能导致真正的冲突，两种惯例总是能并行不悖。\n现在[Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 和 [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] [school_opinion_increase_country.GetAdjective] 之间开启的长期合作，让这相互理解和尊重又更进一步。

original: God is great.
translation: 真主至上。

original: Normalization of relations between the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and the [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool]
translation: [Root.GetReligiousSchool]与[school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool]关系缓和

original: For some time the relationship between the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and the [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] have been strongly colored by distrust and conflict. Some scholars have gone as far as to denounce the theologians of the other school and their followers.\nHowever, tensions have been greatly lessened in recent years and with [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GetReligiousSchool] and [school_opinion_increase_country.GetAdjective] [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] scholars leading the way towards tolerance and coexistence.
translation: 一段时间以来，[Root.GetReligiousSchool] 和 [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool]之间的笼罩在猜疑和冲突之中。一些学者甚至谴责其他学派的神学家及其追随者。\n然而，近年来，[Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 和 [school_opinion_increase_country.GetAdjective] [school_opinion_increase_country.GetReligiousSchool] 之间的紧张局势大大减少，学者们引领着两国走向了宽容与共存的道路。

original: God is great.
translation: 真主至上。

original: The Ulema and the [Root.GetAdjective] - [school_opinion_decrease_country.GetAdjective] War
translation: 乌理玛与[Root.GetAdjective] - [school_opinion_decrease_country.GetAdjective]之战

original: The prolonged conflict between the [school_opinion_decrease_country.GetAdjective] and the [Root.GetAdjective] is starting to spill into the religious realm. Mutual respect and tolerance is on an all time low and [school_opinion_decrease_country.GetReligiousSchool] thought is being marginalized in [Root.GetAdjective] society.
translation: [school_opinion_decrease_country.GetAdjective] 和 [Root.GetAdjective] 之间的长期冲突开始蔓延到宗教领域。 相互尊重和宽容变得困难，在[Root.GetAdjective]，[school_opinion_decrease_country.GetReligiousSchool] 的思想被边缘化了。

original: Outrageous.
translation: 令人发指。

original: A Talented Judge
translation: 一位才华横溢的法官

original: Acquiring an education in theology and law is often a long process involving studying classical works of law, under the tutelage of the Shiekhs of various Madrasahs. For every work or commentary learnt the student acquires a certificate, an Ijaza. Depending on what Madrasha, and which Sheikh, the worth of the Ijaza may not necessarily be the same.\nA specific learned man has lately been making a very good impression in Madrasahs around the country, no doubt he has a great career as a Qadi or Mufti ahead of him.
translation: 在神学和法律上的教育通常是一个漫长的过程，涉及到研究古典文学作品，在各种宗教的谢赫的指导下。在每一个工作或论文中，学生都获得了一个证书，一个学派。根据伊斯兰学校和谢赫的不同，学派的价值不一定是相同的。\n一个特别有学问的人最近在全国各地的伊斯兰学校都给人留下了很好的印象，毫无疑问，他就像在他前面的卡迪或穆夫提一样。

original: I hear [mufti_province.GetAreaName] is in need of a new Qadi.
translation: 我听说 [mufti_province.GetAreaName] 我们需要一个新的卡迪。

original: He will bring legal guidance to a generation as a Mufti in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 作为穆夫提，他将给一代人法律上的指导[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]

original: The Sheik-ul-Islam
translation: 谢赫-乌尔

original: Where the Qadis are the judges of the land, the Muftis are the ones to provide general legal interpretation and doctrine. A [Root.GovernmentName] as large as ours, however, needs an overarching authority over all Muftis. Traditionally this is the role of the Sheik-ul-Islam.\nThe Sheik-ul-Islam will not only author Fatwas himself, he will also be the one to appoint many of the regional Muftis in our realm, and ultimately he is the person who will safeguard the legality of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s edicts. Naturally the man we pick will belong to the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] but there are a number of distinguished candidates to choose from.
translation: 卡迪是地方的法官，穆夫提是解释法律和教义的人。然而，一个像我们这样的[Root.GovernmentName] ，需要在所有的穆夫提心中都有一个至高无上的权威。传统上，这是伊斯兰教的角色。\n谢赫-乌尔不仅将是他自己的裁决者，他还将成为我们王国中许多地区的穆夫提的裁决者，他将捍卫君主合法[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的法令。我们挑选的人自然会属于这一地区[Root.GetReligiousSchool]，但有许多杰出的候选人可供选择。

original: Let us elect the foremost and most loyal Mufti to this position
translation: 让我们选出最重要、最忠诚的穆夫提

original: A loyal Sheik-ul-Islam will almost always take sides for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and will increase the chance of support from the religious establishment.
translation: 一个忠诚的谢赫-乌尔总是会偏袒 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 并将增加宗教机构支持的机会。

original: The most learned and steadfast candidate must be named Sheik-ul-Islam.
translation: 最有学问、最坚定的候选人被命名为谢赫-乌尔。

original: A righteous Sheik-ul-Islam will support us as long as we maintain a pious rule. This will also make events relating to the will of our religious scholars more common.
translation: 只要我们保持虔诚的统治，正义的伊斯兰教徒就会支持我们。这也将使与我们宗教学者的意愿有关的事件更加普遍的发生。

original: A famous Sufi will give this office the dignity it deserves.
translation: 一个著名的苏菲将赋予这个弥撒应有的尊严。

original: A sufi Sheik-ul-Islam will support us as long as we support sufism in the realm. This will also make events relating to sufism more common.
translation: 只要我们支持苏菲派，苏菲派的伊斯兰教徒就会支持我们。这也会使与苏菲派相关的事件更加普遍。

original: New Madrasah
translation: 新的伊斯兰大学

original: Prominent citizens of [madrassah_province.GetAreaName] have made a number of charitable donations for the establishment of a new Madrasah in [madrassah_province.GetCapitalName]. They have invited scholars not only from the wider [madrassah_province.GetAreaName] but also from [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and even foreign theologians.
translation: [madrassah_province.GetAreaName]的杰出公民为捐了一大笔钱，在[madrassah_province.GetCapitalName]新建一所伊斯兰大学。他们不仅邀请了来自[madrassah_province.GetAreaName]的学者，也有来自[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的，甚至外国的神学家。

original: Wonderful.
translation: 完美。

original: Ghazis
translation: 勇士

original: For centuries, wars to expand the faith has seen groups of 'Ghazis', or holy warriors on the frontiers of Islam, raiding enemy lands and bolstering the ranks of the faithful. Our war against the infidel [infidel.GetAdjective] has attracted the attention of such warriors. They have come to join our ranks to prove their worth as holy warriors, and perhaps for the promise of loot as well.
translation: 几个世纪以来，为了扩大信仰而展开的战争，在伊斯兰教的边境上看到了一些「加扎尔」(Ghazis)或「圣战士」(holy warriors)，他们袭击了敌国并保护朝圣者的队伍。我们对异教徒[infidel.GetAdjective]的战争引起了这些战士的注意。他们加入我们的行列，为了证明他们是神圣的战士，也可能只是为了得到战利品。

original: They are welcome.
translation: 欢迎他们

original: Custodianship of [holy_city.GetCapitalName]
translation: [holy_city.GetCapitalName]的监护人

original: With each year the holy city of [holy_city.GetCapitalName] has seen an increase in the number of pilgrims that seek the shrines there. The faithful come from all corners of the Islamic world, bringing commerce, goods, capital, news and ideas from faraway places to our ports.
translation: 每年，越来越多的朝圣者来到圣城[holy_city.GetCapitalName]参见圣地。虔诚的信徒来自伊斯兰世界的各个角落，将商业、商品、资本、新闻、思想从远方带到我们的港口。

original: God is Good.
translation: 真主至上！

original: Shiite Migration
translation: 什叶派迁徙

original: While Shiism is widespread in the Islamic world, most Shiites live in lands ruled by Sunni or even non-muslim states. In order to survive, our brothers of faith often have to adopt a policy of Taqiyya, deliberately pretending to distance themselves from the Shia faith. As one of few Shia [Root.GovernmentName]s we have come to attract members of faith who no longer want to live out their spiritual lives in secrecy. Many of them are both learned and productive members of society.
translation: 虽然什叶派在伊斯兰世界普遍存在，但大多数什叶派教徒生活在由逊尼派甚至非穆斯林国家统治的土地上。为了生存，我们的兄弟们常常不得不采取一种叫塔基尼的政策，故意假装与什叶派的信仰保持距离。 作为少数的什叶派之一 [Root.GovernmentName]吸引相同信仰的成员，他们不再希望在秘密中度过他们的精神生活。他们中的许多人都是学习和生产的能手。

original: Let us welcome them into our cities.
translation: 欢迎来到我们的城市!

original: Let us send them forth to populate the frontier.
translation: 让我们派遣他们去开拓边境。

original: Sufi Syncretism
translation: 苏菲派兼容主义

original: Sufis, with their mystical and less legalistic approach to Islam, are often more welcome among the heathen than the highly educated Ulema or soldiers of the faith. Manifesting piety in other ways such as dance, singing and by blending the Islamic traditions with local ones, the Sufis are not always at the best term with the religious establishment.\nA sufi leader has managed to get quite a following in [sufi_province.GetName], with a great number of [sufi_province.Religion.GetName] converts joining his disciples. His followers are clearing land for new settlements where they might live together and this could well lead to a much greater Islamic influence in the entire area. Many among the Ulema are asking that we send him on his way, as they fear he is leading the true faithful astray and blurring the line between Islam and the [sufi_province.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 苏菲派更倾向于神秘主义而非教条主义实践伊斯兰信仰，因此比起那些饱读诗书的乌理玛和信仰卫士，他们在异教徒受到了更大的欢迎。苏菲派实践信仰的方式更为独特，他们用舞蹈，唱歌以及其他将伊斯兰传统和当地传统相结合的方式，但这些苏菲派对宗教当局来说并非善茬。\n一位苏菲派领袖在 [sufi_province.GetName]获得了相当程度的支持 ，有一大批 [sufi_province.Religion.GetName] 改信者加入了他的教团。他的追随者们整饬土地以建立新定居点，共同居住。这很可能在整片地区制造出相当强的伊斯兰教影响。乌理玛中有很多人都力主把他驱走，他们害怕他会将真信误入歧途，在伊斯兰教和[sufi_province.Religion.GetName] 当地信仰之间制造迷惑。

original: He is doing God's work.
translation: 他在践行真主之道。

original: He will have to do his preaching elsewhere.
translation: 他最好得去别的地方传教。

original: Foreign Theologians Enliven Scholarship
translation: 外国神学家大兴学问

original: The theologians we invited to our country have come to greatly enrich local religious scholarship. They have left their mark upon our country and inspired a new generation of Ulema.
translation: 我们请来的神学家们已经大大扩展了我国宗教学问。他们在我国起到了重要意义，激励了新一代乌理玛。

original: I have need of them in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 我需要他们来 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]

original: They will find their places throughout our country.
translation: 他们总会在我国找到适合的地方。

original: [scholar_country.GetReligiousSchool] Theologians
translation: [scholar_country.GetReligiousSchool]  神学家

original: By giving [scholar_country.GetAdjective] scholars in our Madrasahs we are not only improving the theological discussion in our country but also improving our ties with the [scholar_country.GetName] [scholar_country.GovernmentName].
translation: 为我国伊斯兰学校送入 [scholar_country.GetAdjective] 的学者不光提高了国家神学讨论水平，还强化了我们与[scholar_country.GetName] [scholar_country.GovernmentName]的关系。

original: Excellent.
translation: 很好

original: Religious Scholars Disagree
translation: 宗教学者的分歧

original: Not all theologians agree. Normally this is not much of a problem, as disagreement can exist without problem in the scholarly world. Sometimes disagreements take on a more personal form however, some would argue that's how our invited scholars came to be at odds with much of our religious establishment, causing much harm to our international reputation.
translation: 神学家中有分歧。一般来说这并不是什么问题，学术界就算没什么质疑也能出现分歧。当然有的时候，分歧会以更加个人的形式表现出来，有些人争辩我们请来的学者和我国宗教机关争执不断，这对我们的国际声誉造成了损害。

original: Unfortunate.
translation: 真倒霉

original: Playing the Courts
translation: 搬弄法庭

original: While the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] school is the officially sanctioned school of the [Root.GovernmentName] there are many courts and Qadis throughout our lands and all four of the schools of faith are deemed appropriate for civil procedures. This means that to some extent it is possible to 'play the courts' by bringing a case before a Qadi of a school considered more likely to give a beneficial ruling to a specific case.\nAn entrepreneuring merchant in [shiites_here.GetCapitalName] has become so good at this that it has angered not only the local population and his business competitors, but also the local governor. There is not much we can do about this without making inroads into the privileges of the Ulema.
translation: 虽然 [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 是 [Root.GovernmentName]官方的法律学派，在我国各地还有其他法庭与宗教法官，在民事诉讼中应用所有四种宗教学派都被视作合理合法。这某种程度上意味着在个别案子中，“搬弄法庭”，即将案子交给可以做出更有利判决的宗教法官学派，不失为合理选择。\n一位野心勃勃的 [shiites_here.GetCapitalName] 商人尤其精于此道，这不仅激怒了当地百姓和他的生意对手，也激怒了当地政府官员。我们别无选择，如要干涉，就要侵犯乌理玛阶层的特权。

original: Let us just ensure that this man is dealt with.
translation: 总之我们要确保严惩此人。

original: Pragmatism must come before theology.
translation: 实用主义一定是优于神学的

original: Taqiyya
translation: 塔基亚

original: For centuries, many of the followers of Ali have considered it a necessity to hide themselves and feign adherence to other religious customs in order to keep their faith alive. Authorities in [shiites_here.GetName] have increasingly come to suspect that there is an increasing number of Shias among the local sufi lodges, and would like our blessing in their attempts to root them out.
translation: 几个世纪以来，许多阿里的追随者认为将自己伪装起来，假装信从其他宗教信仰对于保持他们原本的信仰极为重要。[shiites_here.GetName] 当局越加怀疑当地的什叶派越来越多，他们集中于苏菲派道堂附近。当局希望得到我们的支持，除掉这些人。

original: We cannot tolerate heretics!
translation: 我们不能容忍异教徒!

original: We must respect the Sufi lodges.
translation: 我们必须尊重苏菲派道堂。

original: Protests in [protest_province.GetName]
translation: [protest_province.GetName]的抗议

original: As men of great spiritual strength, but also firmly part of the establishment, members of the Ulema sometimes choose to join social protests. A recent altercation between the local garrison and the urban population in [protest_province.GetName] have attracted the attention of prominent Mufti in the state of [protest_province.GetAreaName].\nOur local commander fears the situation might escalate unless we listen to the protesters, but doing so would come at a cost.
translation: 乌理玛是一群精神坚韧的信众，和秉持保守思想的顽固派，因此他们的成员有时会加入社会抗议中。 近日[protest_province.GetName]的驻军和市民之间发生了纠纷，这件事吸引了 [protest_province.GetAreaName]著名穆夫提的注意力。\n我们的当地指挥官担心如果不听从抗议者局势会升级，但这样做花费颇多。

original: Let us compensate the people of [protest_province.GetName].
translation: 让我们补偿[protest_province.GetName]的人民

original: Mufti or not, there is nothing we can do.
translation: 什么穆提夫不穆提夫的，我们管不了

original: The poor of [urbanization_province.GetCapitalName]
translation: [urbanization_province.GetCapitalName]的穷人

original: As cities grow, the old amenities and walls that once supported them decay. In [urbanization_province.GetCapitalName] this has over time led to change. Less clean workshops, such as those of tanners, have moved beyond the city walls, as have the cemeteries. Most visible, however, is the increasing number of poor in the streets. As existing charities have not been able to keep up with the rapid growth of the city, it has been suggested that we set aside more state property as Waqf, charitable donations for the upkeep of public soup kitchens and bath houses.
translation: 原来的城镇设施和城墙曾经在城市发展中助力甚多。而今天在 [urbanization_province.GetCapitalName]这样的状况正随着时间流逝而改变。那些较为肮脏的工作坊，如制革坊，已经和公墓一起搬到了城墙外。然而最显而易见的是，街上的穷人正在增多。现有的慈善机构已经不足以支持城市的快速发展，有人建议我们拿出更多国家财产，比如捐赠而得的教产，来维持公共粥厂和洗浴室。

original: We will naturally support such a cause.
translation: 我们当然会支持这项事业。

original: Surely local notables can afford charity out of their own pockets?
translation: 那些当地权贵真的愿意自掏腰包搞慈善吗

original: The City of [holy_city.GetCapitalName]
translation: [holy_city.GetCapitalName]城

original: As Custodians of the holy mosques of [holy_city.GetCapitalName] we are responsible not only for the Holy Shrine. A state that claims this honor is also expected to fend for both the population of the holy cities, as well as the pilgrims they attract. For this purpose many rulers have devoted great resources, both within the cities themselves and large tracts of faraway farmland, in order to feed and maintain the area.\nSome say [Root.Monarch.GetName] has not been paying the attention to these cities that they deserve, that pilgrims are no longer safe and that there is great want in the streets of [holy_city.GetCapitalName].
translation: 作为 [holy_city.GetCapitalName] 圣清真寺的监护人，我们不光要承担其管理圣庙的责任 一个承此荣誉的势力当然也要保卫圣城人民，以及前来朝圣的朝圣者们。为此，许多统治者不仅在城市里，还在遥远的大片农田上都倾注大量资源，以期供给这一地区。\n有人说 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 没有为这些城市尽责，致使朝圣者们安全有虞，[holy_city.GetCapitalName]内物资短缺。

original: Let us set aside more land for their upkeep.
translation: 让我们把更多土地用于供养他们。

original: Sadly we have no more resources to spare right now.
translation: 很遗憾现在我们分身乏术。

original: Expansion of the [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName] Madrasah
translation: [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName]伊斯兰学院的扩展

original: The Madrasah of [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName] has been gaining repute, not only as a center of [Root.GetReligiousSchool] learning, but also for its Shiekhs from other schools. [Root.GetReligiousScholars] scholars from other parts of the world have in particular made a name for themselves at the [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName] Madrasah and as a result both the institution itself, the adjoining market district and the bustling city as a whole is growing rapidly.\nUrban growth is never without its problems, however, and a growing Madrasah still needs to be provided for. If the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] would set aside a larger charitable donation for the upkeep and maintenance of a greater Madrasah it would benefit both the city and the area at large.
translation: [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName] 的伊斯兰学院声望日隆，不仅因为它是 [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 学术中心，而且因为它还有来自其他学派的谢赫。 世界各地的[Root.GetReligiousScholars] 学者特别以进入 [madrasa_province.GetCapitalName] 伊斯兰学院为荣，因此不仅学院当地，就连临近的市场区，整个喧闹的城市，都发展的十分迅速。\n城市发展当然伴随着问题，但是我们也很需要一个高度发展的伊斯兰学院。 如果[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] 也能为供养更大的清真寺而慷慨捐赠，城市及周遭地区都能受益匪浅。

original: We must contribute to this endeavor.
translation: 我们必须大力支持这项事业。

original: The locals can feed and pay for them.
translation: 让当地人自己供养算了。

original: Dargah
translation: 达迦

original: A Sufi Sheikh has passed away in [dargah_province.GetName] and his followers are now putting up a shrine in his honor. Pilgrims from various parts of the country are already starting to come to the province to see the shrine of this great man, some calling him a saint. Local notables have set aside a charitable donation its maintenance and his former pupils have opened a lodge nearby.\nWhile there is nothing wrong with honoring a great man, some more traditionalist among the pious and the Ulema feel that this form or worship is sacrilegious.\n Should [Root.Monarch.GetName] pay the shrine in [dargah_province.GetName] a visit it might do much, both for the prestige of the shrine itself but also for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] popular perception.
translation: 一位苏菲派谢赫在 [dargah_province.GetName] 去世了，他的追随者们建造了一座庙宇来纪念他。全国各地的朝圣者已经开始蜂拥而至，瞻仰圣地，甚至有人称他为圣徒。 当地权贵为此地运营提供了一笔可观的捐赠，而他过去的学生也在附近开设了住所。\n纪念伟大人物固然无可厚非，但是还是有一些传统的虔信者和乌理玛认为这种纪念是一种亵渎。\n如果 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 前去参拜 [dargah_province.GetName]的庙宇，不仅会对神庙的声望本身，也会对 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]人民拥护程度产生重大影响。

original: Let us seek guidance at this holy place.
translation: 让我们前往圣地寻求指引。

original: We must not feed into local superstition.
translation: 我们不能助长地方上的迷信。

original: Alevis of [alevi_province.GetName]
translation: [alevi_province.GetName]的阿列维派

original: While they are not our direct brothers of faith, a great number among the Turkic tribesmen in Anatolia are Shia Alevis. Like the Jafari's the Alevis are twelvers and believe in the coming of the Twelve Imam. Their faith is also quite deeply entrenched in mysticism and Sufism. Under Sunni rule they have been forced to live a life in many ways secluded from society, they have not been allowed to intermarry the Sunnis and they have been distrusted by the state.\nMany among the people of [alevi_province.GetName] are Alevis and they have generally welcomed us as their new overlords. Their mystical traditions are in many ways different from ours but if we embraced these people we could likely spread the Shia faith much more quickly in the area.
translation: 一大批安纳托利亚的土耳其部族都是什叶阿拉维派，他们并非我们直接的同信同袍。 阿拉维派和贾法里派一样，属于十二伊玛目派，相信十二伊玛目的降临。他们的信仰也有很重的神秘主义和苏菲派趋向。在逊尼派统治之下，他们不得不低调处世，与世隔绝，不能和逊尼派通婚，饱受当局怀疑。\nMany among the people of [alevi_province.GetName] 有许多阿列维派，他们很欢迎我们做新的统治者。他们神秘主义的传统和我们有诸多不同，但是如果我们包容这些人，我们在这一地区就可以更快的传播什叶派信仰。

original: Let us empower our brothers of faith in the area.
translation: 让我们援助我们在当地的同信兄弟。

original: While we welcome them, administration will remain in the hands of local authorities.
translation: 如果我们善待这些人，当地权贵就会继续天高皇帝远。

original: The Worldly Ulema
translation: 世俗乌理玛

original: Not all members of the Ulema are great theologians or intellectuals. Corruption can grow in any corner of the state and for some it can be hard to tell apart what benefits the faith and what might benefit themselves. It has come to the attention of [Root.Monarch.GetName] that a number of pious grants that exist around the empire have been obtained through fraud or illegally passed on to heirs. Our wazir has suggested that we inspect and verify all such grants in the [Root.GovernmentName], especially in regions that were not originally ruled by us.\nThis would clearly be a grave affront to the Ulema, however, who would see it as an encroachment on their privileges and an attack on their caste as a whole.
translation: 并非所有乌理玛成员都是大神学家和知识分子。腐败可能在国家任何地方生长，很多人无法分别什么利于真信，而什么只是为自己牟利。 [Root.Monarch.GetName]注意到，帝国内有一些虔诚捐赠其实是通过欺诈或非法继承给继承人获得的。我们的维齐尔建议在 [Root.GovernmentName]，内监察所有这样的捐赠，特别是在我们没有直接管辖的地区。\n但是这显然是对乌理玛阶层的严重侮辱，特别是有些人会把这视作侵犯他们的权利，是对全体乌理玛发动的攻击。

original: A few transgressions are nothing compared to what these men give us.
translation: 和这些人的贡献相比，一点小罪过无足挂齿。

original: Only traitors have anything to fear.
translation: 只有叛徒才会害怕检查。

original: The Maddhab of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的教法学派

original: As a young country we are not yet patronizing any particular religious school. While there are many ways to follow God we should have a specific guiding doctrine for our rulers to follow.
translation: 我们是一个新生的国家，还没有遵从任何一种教法学派。虽然有许多方法跟随神，但我们的统治者应该遵循其中一个具体的指导原则。

original: Ok.
translation: 好的。

original: Let us follow the school of Abu Hanifa.
translation: 让我们遵循哈乃斐学派。

original: There is only the way of the Hanbalis.
translation: 罕百里学派才是正道。

original: Malik ibn Anas has shown the right way.
translation: 马立克学派彰显了正道。

original: Imam al-Shafi'i's teachings are the most relevant.
translation: 沙斐仪学派最有说服力。

original: The Jafari school will last us until the arrival of the Madhi.
translation: 信仰贾法里学派，等待马赫迪降临。

original: Ismail ibn Jafar and his followers will be our guides.
translation: 伊斯玛仪·伊本·贾法尔及其追随者将指引我们。

original: Let us never hide our principles! We must follow Zaid ibn Ali's teachings.
translation: 不要掩盖我们的信仰！跟从赛义德·伊本·阿里的教诲。

original: Neo Sufism & Traditionalist Reaction
translation: 新苏菲派和传统主义者的反动

original: Many among the Ulema are increasingly unhappy with the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Among pious Muslims, our inclusion of heathens in high offices as well as the adoption of heathen customs and traditions, is viewed with scorn. The intrusions of the state on interpretation of law and other traditional domains of the Ulema have also not earned the state any friends among the jurists of the realm.\nCharismatic Shiekhs of the Sufi Naqshbandi order have begun to agitate against the state what they consider a wrongful, and in some cases sinful implementation of Islamic law in our realm.
translation: 乌理玛中有许多人对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]深感不满。虔诚的穆斯林中不少人认为，我们吸收异教徒进入高层，并且接受他们的习惯和传统是极为鄙下的。国家查收乌理玛管辖下的法律解释权及其他许多传统事务，使得国内的法理学家纷纷倒戈相向。\n苏菲纳黑希班底教派蛊惑人心的谢赫们已经开始抗议国家的某些行为是错误的，甚至在我国现行伊斯兰教法下是有罪的。

original: They are sadly misguided.
translation: 很不幸他们走上了歧途。

original: From now on the religious establishment will react more strongly to impious conduct of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 现在起宗教势力会对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的不虔行为做出更大反应。

original: The §YUlema§! will now expect to be granted more land.
translation: §Y乌理玛§!现在渴望得到更多土地。

original: Wahabism
translation: 瓦哈比派

original: A growing movement among the Hanbali Ulema of the [Root.GovernmentName] of [Root.GetName] is advocating a return to a purer faith. They strongly oppose any innovations to the prophets customs, and anything that is not part of the literary sources of Islamic Law. Strongly opposing all forms of Sufism, saint worship or Non-Islamic traditions they promise to bring a truer religious society to all who embrace their teachings.
translation: [Root.GetName] 的[Root.GovernmentName]罕百里乌理玛的一项运动不断发展壮大，他们主张回归更纯洁的信仰。他们强烈反对任何对先知习俗的革新，以及任何不属于伊斯兰法律渊源的东西，强烈反对一切形式的苏菲派圣徒崇拜或非伊斯兰的传统。他们承诺给所有支持他们的人建立一个更加纯洁的宗教社会。

original: Interesting.
translation: 有趣。

original: It is now be possible for Tribal Federations to change school to Hanbali.
translation: 部落联盟制现在可以将学派改变为罕百里学派。

original: Sufi Shrines
translation: 苏菲神社

original: The practice to patronize or even provide for shrines connected to the tombs of famous Sufis has long been a major point of contention for the Ulema. With a more traditionalist generation taking power they are now placing pressure on our ruler to try to clamp down on this custom.
translation: 长期以来，保护甚至奉供苏菲坟墓一体的神社的做法一直是乌理玛争论的焦点。 随着更传统的一代掌权，他们现在对我们的统治者施加压力，试图压制这种习俗。

original: We must do as they ask.
translation: 我们必须按照他们所说的去做

original: No. The old masters were great men!
translation: 不，我们的统治者是完美无缺的！

original: Neo Sufism & Traditionalism: $VAL$
translation: 新苏菲派和传统依靠: $VAL$

original: Compile the [Root.GetReligiousSchool] Fiqh
translation: 编写 [Root.GetReligiousSchool] 律

original: It is not always clear, even to the most well-read of the Ulema, how to best apply the Sharia and over the centuries a large number of contradictory rulings have come to exist in some areas. If we spent considerable time and effort to allow the best minds of the realm to compile and write a comprehensive review of [Root.GetReligiousSchool] Fiqh, this would likely be be an immense aid to all Qadis and Muftis in our realm.
translation: 几个世纪以来，许多地区存在的矛盾和纠纷已经被调解，但是即使是最博学的乌理玛也不是一直很清楚如何最好地运用伊斯兰教教法。如果我们允许一些国内精英投入时间和精力去编写一个关于[Root.GetReligiousSchool] 律的全面解读，这可能对国内所有卡迪和穆夫提大有帮助。

original: The compilation of the Fatawah-i [Root.Monarch.GetName]i will take many years, during which time the below modifier is active:
translation: 需要花上几年的时间来完成 [Root.Monarch.GetName]律，期间以下修正将被激活:

original: Once the project is complete, the modifier will go away and we will receive the benefits:
translation: 一旦这个项目完成，这些修正将取消同时我们会获得好处:

original: §YCan enact a Taxation Policy!§!
translation: §Y可以制定税收政策§!

original: $POWERS|Y$ can currently be enacted.
translation: 目前可施行$POWERS|Y$。

original: §YCan use a Cultural Interaction!§!
translation: §Y可以进行文化交流！§!

original: $POWERS|Y$ can currently be used.
translation: $POWERS|Y$目前可以使用。

original: §YCan use a Feudal Theocracy Action!§!
translation: §Y可以进行封建神权行动!§!

original: $POWERS|Y$ can currently be used.
translation: $POWERS|Y$目前可以使用。

original: §YCan demand a Tribal Tribute!§!
translation: §Y可以要求部落捐赠!§!

original: $POWERS|Y$ can currently be demanded.
translation: $POWERS|Y$ 目前可以被要求。

original: During this period you can not enact another Iqta Taxation Policy.
translation: 在此期间你不能再执行另一项伊克塔税收政策

original: Religious Scholar Has Left
translation: 宗教学者已经离开

original: When a religious scholar leaves our country.
translation: 当一个宗教学者已经离开我们的国家

original: Religious Scholar Has Left
translation: 宗教学者已经离开

original: $MOD$
translation: $MOD$

original: has expired in
translation: 已过期于

original: $COUNTRY$
translation: $COUNTRY$

original: The $MOD|Y$ that have been our guests for 20 years have now gone on to other Madrasahs.
translation: $MOD|Y$已经客居此地 20 年了，现在他要前往其他伊斯兰学院了。

original: $MOD$ expired in $COUNTRY$.
translation: $COUNTRY$的「$MOD$」到期了。

original: OK
translation: 好的

original: OK
translation: 好的

original: Go to
translation: 前往

original: $WHO$ Missionary Strength: $VAL$\n
translation: $WHO$传教强度：$VAL$\n

original: Select Trading Policy
translation: 选择贸易政策

original: \nAre you sure you want to set your Trading Policy in $NODE|Y$ to $NAME|Y$? You cannot select a new Policy for §Y$MONTHS$ months§!.\n
translation: \n你确定将你在贸易节点$NODE|Y$的贸易政策设置为$NAME|Y$？设置政策后§Y $MONTHS$ 个月§!内你将不能选择新的政策。\n

original: \nIf the following is no longer fulfilled, the policy will be changed back to $DEFAULT|Y$:\n$IF$
translation: \n如果以下列要求未被满足，政策将改回$DEFAULT|Y$：\n$IF$

original: Growing Merchant Community
translation: 不断发展的商业社区

original: Merchants Discriminated
translation: 商人团受诽谤

original: Thriving Merchant Community
translation: 繁荣的商人社区

original: The foreign quarter in the province capital of here has grown tremendously, resulting in a temporary surge in the local economy.
translation: 省会城市的外国贸易份额大幅上升，导致了当地经济的短暂增长

original: Local Traders Strengthened
translation: 本地贸易力量加强

original: We have taken harsh measures to support our local traders in this province, at the expense of any foreign merchants in the area.
translation: 我们采取了严苛的措施来限制外国商队在该地的利益，从而有效支持了该省份我们的贸易力量

original: Embrace Wahabism
translation: 拥抱瓦哈比教

original: A new strand of the Hanbali school is gaining popularity among some of our tribesmen. While the Hanbali school has not been our prefered Maddhab many influential scholars are now arguing that we should join this movement.
translation: 许多罕百里学派在我们的部落中越来越受欢迎，虽然罕百里学派不是我们的首选，但是许多有影响力的学者正在争论我们是否应该加入这项运动

original: Meddled in Our Trade
translation: 介入我们的贸易

original: Great Importer
translation: 大进口商

original: Luxury Goods In Demand
translation: 奢侈品货物的需求

original: Local luxury products have become very fashionable in a foreign capital. The wealth brought in has lead to a surge in local enterprise.
translation: 本地生产的奢侈品已经在国外变得非常时髦，所带来的财富使得本地企业数量激增。

original: Banditry in Check
translation: 清查匪患

original: Foreign Merchants in the area has stepped in to curtail banditry in this province.
translation: 在当地的外国商人团由于此省份中的匪患陷入麻烦。

original: Merchants Hampered by Bandits
translation: 被强盗挟持的商人团

original: Local Merchants Out-competed
translation: 本地商人团处于劣势

original: The local merchants in this province have been out-competed by foreigners who have come to dominate business in the cities here. More goods are being created than before but much of the profits end up in foreign hands.
translation: 处于该省份的本地的商团与外国的商团竞争中正处于劣势，城中的市场份额也被夺走。虽然有更多的产品正在产出，但是利润都被外国所占有。

original: Protectionism
translation: 贸易保护

original: Local Protectionism
translation: 地方贸易保护

original: In order to ensure that local traders are favored over foreign interests we have made life very difficult for outsiders in this province. This has perhaps stunted the local economy but now we can be sure that profits go to the people who deserve them.
translation: 在面对外来资本时，我们要确保本地的商人的利益优秀，所以我们对本省的外来人员做出了种种限制。这可能导致当地经济规模的缩小但是我们确保了利润流向了该得到他的人们手里。

original: Influential Trading Family
translation: 有影响力的贸易家族

original: Regulated Economic Growth
translation: 平稳增长的经济

original: An increased demand for local goods has led to economic growth in this province.
translation: 对本地商品的需求上升导致了省份的经济增长。

original: Unregulated Economic Growth
translation: 经济增长失控

original: While the local economy is thriving it is doing so in an uncontrolled way. There has been many excesses that have resulted in unrest among both in the countryside and in the cities of this area.
translation: 当地的经济的增长失去了控制。在城市和乡村中，出现了许多由过激行为引起的动乱。

original: Lack of Demand for Local Goods
translation: 本地商品供不应求

original: A sudden lack of demand for luxury goods from this province has hampered local businesses.
translation: 省份中对奢侈品的突然短缺导致了经济发展受阻。

original: Influx of Foreign Ideas
translation: 国外思想的涌入

original: Foreign merchants have brought many new methods and ideas into this province. Parts of the local population is not adapting well to the sudden changes, however, and are actively opposing the change.
translation: 外国商队给省份带来了许多新的生产方式和思想。当地一些人民并不能很好地接受这种突如其来的改变，甚至抵制这种改变

original: Traditional Values Entrenched
translation: 根深蒂固的传统价值观

original: In face of new ideas and methods this province has kept to its principles and traditions.
translation: 在面对新的生产方式和想法时，该省的人民还是选择坚持他们的原有的传统和价值观。

original: Foreign Quarter of [quarter_city.GetCapitalName]
translation: [quarter_city.GetCapitalName]的外国人聚居区

original: For a long time foreign merchants have been settling in [quarter_city.GetCapitalName] to better conduct trade with our country. Lately, however, with the intensified activity of the [community_country.GovernmentName] of [community_country.GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry][community_country.GetName] the quarter has grown into a city of its own.\nThis is not without its problems, our own citizens are complaining that the [community_country.GetAdjective] community is growing at their expense. They demand that we impose harsher rules on foreign merchants and curtail their activities outside of the foreign quarter.
translation: 外国商团已经在[quarter_city.GetCapitalName]定居很久了，更好地促进了两国的贸易流通。但是最近，随着[community_country.GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry][community_country.GetName][community_country.GovernmentName]活动得越发频繁，这个聚居区正渐渐扩张为一个城市。\n这不要紧，问题是我们的市民抱怨[community_country.GetAdjective]社区的扩张损害了他们的利益。他们要求我们对外商制定严厉的措施，并限制他们在社区之外的行动。

original: No, we should encourage the foreign community to grow instead.
translation: 不，我们要鼓励外国人建立他们的社区。

original: We must respect the wishes of the good men of [quarter_city.GetCapitalName].
translation: 我们要遵照[quarter_city.GetCapitalName]的商人的意愿。

original: [trade_province.Culture.GetName] [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: [trade_province.Culture.GetName] [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]

original: Due to the long time that many of our merchant families are spending in [trade_province.Culture.GetName] communities and especially among the people of [trade_province.GetAreaName] they have begun to take to the local specialties. Some have begun to market [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] from the area in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] at very high prices.\nThis is an enterprise that is rapidly making both them and the locals very rich...
translation: 由于我们许多商户家庭在[trade_province.Culture.GetName]社区的长期定居，特别是深入[trade_province.GetAreaName]的群众当中。他们已经开始销售当地的特产。一些人已经开始以很高的价格从[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的地区出售[trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]。\n这是一个迅速使他们和当地人民都致富的事业……

original: A great example of private enterprise.
translation: 私营企业优秀模范

original: Beware, for fashion is fickle.
translation: 冷静，时尚潮流变化无常

original: [From.GetAdjective] Demand and [Root.GetAdjective] Supply
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的需求和[Root.GetAdjective]的供给

original: It seems the [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] of [trade_province.GetName] have become increasingly sought after in the [From.GetAdjective] capital, [From.Capital.GetCapitalName]. There was always a high demand for our goods but this exceptional pull has resulted in a great surge of wealth in the province.
translation: 看起来[trade_province.GetName]的[trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]在[From.GetAdjective]的首都[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]非常畅销。我们产品的市场需要居高不下，使得大量财富在省份内积累。

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: The Value of a Good Map
translation: 有价值的地图

original: It seems the merchants of [spy_country.GetName] have been doing a lot more than just trading. In a routine check our local representatives managed to uncover not only a large selection of contraband, but also a set of very detailed maps over our land. So detailed in fact that they are in many cases better than our own. It seems the merchant was not only a spy but also quite good at finding business opportunities.
translation: 看起来 [spy_country.GetName] 的商队不仅仅在从事商业活动。在例行检查中，我们的代表不仅发现了大量的违禁物品，还有一份我们区域的非常详尽的地图。里面提供的细节比我们已掌握的信息还要完善。看起来这个商队既能发现商机也能成为一个间谍。

original: We will make good use of his information.
translation: 我们要好好利用这些信息。

original: Bandits in [banditprovince.GetName]
translation: [banditprovince.GetName]的土匪

original: A young [Root.GetAdjective] Merchant that had been sent to [banditprovince.GetName] with the mission to not only trade but also to map military installations and valuable resources has hit a bit of a snag. The issue is not, as could be expected, the local authorities. Rather the area is plagued by bandits and deserters from the local garrison.\nOur agent has now sent for help from us to clear the area of the worst excesses so that it can be properly mapped and analyzed.
translation: 一个年轻的 [Root.GetAdjective]商人已经前往[banditprovince.GetName] ，他不仅要去做生意，还要在地图上注明军事设施和有价值的资源，结果却遇上了土匪. 这个情况是当局意想不到的，因为该地区正被土匪和驻扎部队的逃兵肆虐。\n我们的代理人正向我们求助，肃清剩余地区的恶劣环境，从而完成绘图和分析工作。

original: We will divert the necessary resources.
translation: 我们会给予必要的资源。

original: No, we would just be aiding the [banditprovince_owner.GetAdjective].
translation: 不，我们只会帮助 [banditprovince_owner.GetAdjective].

original: Foreign Traders Intervene in Local Affairs
translation: 外商干预地区事务

original: Local bandits has long been a problem in [banditprovince.GetName] but it seems the matter has finally been resolved. Rather than local authorities dealing with the problem, however, it seems that it was the [From.GetAdjective] merchant community that stepped in to deal with the problem, paying for it from their own pockets.
translation: [banditprovince.GetName] 当地的匪患一直是个问题，但是看起来它终究还是被解决了。但是并非地方政府出面解决了这个问题，而是  [From.GetAdjective]  的商帮介入此事，自掏腰包平定了这件事。

original: Marvelous
translation: 棒极了

original: Profiteering in [trade_province.GetCapitalName]
translation: [trade_province.GetCapitalName]的暴利

original: The citizens of [trade_province.GetCapitalName] have grown tired of the local influence of greedy [trader_country.GetAdjective] merchants that they claim are using unfair advantages to out-compete local businesses. They demand that we step in to limit the influence of foreign traders on the area and reaffirm the privileges of our own merchants and artisans.\nIf we do not act they might take matters in their own hands...
translation: [trade_province.GetCapitalName]的市民抱怨贪婪的[trader_country.GetAdjective]商队对本地造成的影响，他们坚称商队在利用不正当优势打垮本地企业。他们要求我们介入，去限制外商在此地的影响力，保障当地商人和工匠们的权益。\n如果我们不出手，他们可能就要自行解决了……

original: We must protect our trade.
translation: 我们要保护我们的贸易。

original: Competition is good for everyone.
translation: 竞争对每个人都有益。

original: Growth of the Business of [developing_business_province.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: [developing_business_province.GetFancyTradeGood]产业的扩张

original: Our efforts to maximize trading profits in the area of [developing_business_province.GetAreaName] has born fruit in the province of [developing_business_province.GetName]. Entrepreneurs have managed to greatly increase the output of [developing_business_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] and have found new markets in our capital for the processed goods.
translation: 我们一直努力去最大化我们在[developing_business_province.GetAreaName]的利润，在[developing_business_province.GetName]地区已经实现了我们的构想。企业家们设法扩大了[developing_business_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]的出口量，并在我们的首都找到了加工商品的新市场。

original: Excellent
translation: 棒极了。

original: [Root.prominent_merchant.GetName] and his Family
translation: [Root.prominent_merchant.GetName]和他的家族

original: A merchant family from [merchant_family_province.GetName] has come to greatly expand our long range trade with [foreign_province_owner.GetName]. By successfully establishing themselves in both [foreign_province_owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] and the [foreign_province_owner.GetAdjective] hinterlands they have come to be very influential in both our societies, and very rich. This is a situation we could probably make use of…
translation: 来自[merchant_family_province.GetName]的商人家族大大扩展了我们和[foreign_province_owner.GetName]的远距离贸易。他们成功建立了同[foreign_province_owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]和[foreign_province_owner.GetAdjective]内陆的双赢关系，变得十分富有，并在两个地区获得十足的影响力。我们要好好利用这个环境……

original: Let us use their influence to extract maps of [foreign_province_owner.GetAdjective] hinterlands.
translation: 利用他们的影响来扩大我们在[foreign_province_owner.GetAdjective]内陆的地图。

original: We should not ask what they can do for us. What is good for them is good for us.
translation: 我们不该要求他们能给我们什么好处，对他们有益的就是对我们有益的。

original: Let us make [Root.prominent_merchant.GetName] a the new architect for our trade policies.
translation: 把[Root.prominent_merchant.GetName]作为我们贸易政策的新策划者。

original: Increased Demand for [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]的需求上升

original: [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood] from [trade_province.GetName] fetch a very good price in foreign as well as domestic markets lately. So much so that it has given rise to a new generation of entrepreneurs and economic speculation.
translation: 来自 [trade_province.GetName]的[trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood] 在国内外市场表现良好同时价格不菲。这带动了新一轮经济增长和企业扩张。

original: We should step in to limit any excesses.
translation: 我们要马上限制这些过激行为。

original: Let us lighten regulations to really benefit local entrepreneurs.
translation: 简政放权以鼓励当地企业家。

original: Lack of Demand for [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood]供应的短缺

original: [trade_province.GetName] has long lived of off the locally produced [trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] but lately they have been forced to sell their products at reduced prices. If this is due to the temporary whims of fashion or a more permanent change is hard to say but it is clear that local trade is suffering.
translation: [trade_province.GetName]长期是依赖[trade_province.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]贸易的地区，但最近他们被迫以较低的价格出售他们的产品。很难说这是由于人们心血来潮的改变，抑或是更加永久的变化，但很显然，当地的贸易正在遭受打击。

original: This is regrettable.
translation: 真令人遗憾。

original: Spread of Ideas
translation: 思想传播

original: With the exchange of money and trade goods there is often a spread of methods and ideas. With the growth of the [merchant_country.GetAdjective] merchant activity in [institution_province.GetCapitalName] there is a clear influence on local society. As customs and local fashions develop, some long for the older, and according to them better, times.
translation: 随着商品和货币的交换，思想和技术往往也会传播开来。 随着 [merchant_country.GetAdjective] 的商业活动在[institution_province.GetCapitalName]的开展，他也对社会产生了一个明显的影响。 一些根深蒂固的传统风俗和潮流正在变化，时代会让他们变得更好。

original: Our society has only to gain from progress.
translation: 我们的社会只能从进步中获益。

original: Let us protect traditional [institution_province.culture.GetName] society.
translation: 让我们保护传统 [institution_province.culture.GetName] 社会.

original: Trading Settlement
translation: 贸易特区

original: We have allowed Muslim traders to create their own settlement outside of our cities in this province.
translation: 我们允许穆斯林商人在本省城区之外建立自己的贸易特区。

original: Controlled Trade
translation: 控制贸易

original: We have placed limitations on the growth of the Muslim merchant community in this province. This makes it much easier to control and tax them, but might also hamper the growth of our cities here in the long run.
translation: 我们对省内穆斯林商人团体的成长做了限制。这样更易于控制和征税，但长远上看，这也限制了我们城市的发展。

original: Islamic Missionaries
translation: 伊斯兰传教士

original: We have allowed a number of Muslim missionaries to settle in this province.
translation: 我们准许了一些穆斯林传教士在本省定居。

original: Sailor Community
translation: 水手社区

original: This province is home to a thriving community of Muslim sailors.
translation: 本省是繁荣的穆斯林水手社区的家园。

original: Isolated Religious Community
translation: 孤立的宗教社区

original: We have moved to isolate the religious community in this province to limit the spread of their faith.
translation: 我们转而在本省孤立宗教社区，以限制他们的信仰传播。

original: Expanding Religious Influence
translation: 扩大宗教影响力

original: The recent founding of a great Mosque nearby has made this area more susceptible to the spread of new religious ideas.
translation: 附近新建的清真寺让本地更易受到新宗教理念传播的影响。

original: Local Missionary Strength increases the speed of conversion for the §YPropagate Religion§! Trade Policy.\n\n
translation: §Y传播宗教信仰§!贸易政策将提高本地传教强度\n\n

original: Discriminated Our Countrymen
translation: 区分我们的国民

original: Sultan in Name
translation: 以苏丹之名

original: Joined the community of the Faithful
translation: 加入同一信仰的社区

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] will henceforth be known as a Sultan, improving our relations by §G75§! towards all known §YMuslim§! countries.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName] 今后将被称为苏丹，对所有已发现的 §Y穆斯林§!国家关系提高 §G75§!

original: Our relations will improve by §G50§! towards all known §YMuslim§! countries.
translation: 我们对所有已发现的 §Y穆斯林§! 国家关系提高 §G50§!

original: Islamic Syncretism
translation: 伊斯兰融合

original: We have adopted many titles and customs of the Islamic kingdoms in our region to further our diplomatic and mercantile goals.
translation: 我们在区域内采用了许多伊斯兰王国的头衔和风俗，以实现外交和经济目标。

original: Traditional Kingship
translation: 传统王权

original: Our ruler has defended the traditional notions of kingship in our society and marginalized Islamic groups in the higher nobility and government.
translation: 我们的统治者捍卫了社会中关于王权的传统观念，并在高层贵族和政府中边缘化了伊斯兰群体。

original: The Dominant Religion in our Country is a form of Islam.
translation: 我国的主流宗教是伊斯兰教的一种形式。

original: Adopt Islam as the State Religion
translation: 接受伊斯兰教作为国教

original: Islam has increasingly grown to be the dominant religion both in government, among our subjects and our nobility. It is time we join the community of the faithful.
translation: 不管是在政府、平民还是贵族群体中，伊斯兰都已经成长为主流宗教。是时候把大家团结在信仰之下了。

original: Pretentions of Local Potentates
translation: 地方统治者的争议

original: A local chief has begun styling himself as Sultan and fancies himself an independent ruler.
translation: 一个地方长官开始以苏丹的风格行事，设想自己是一个独立的统治者。

original: Rejection of Syncretism
translation: 拒绝融合

original: We are actively working against the spread of Islamic Syncretism in our country.
translation: 积极反对伊斯兰教融合在我国的传播。

original: Fought our Bandits
translation: 打击匪盗

original: Traders in [trade_province.GetCapitalName]
translation: [trade_province.GetCapitalName]的商人

original: Muslim traders have been an increasingly common sight in our ports for generations now and we have grown used to them and their religion. In our ports in the [trade_province.GetName] province, and especially [trade_province.GetCapitalName] itself these merchants have become so commonplace that they are now an integral part of the urban population.\nRecently some of these traders have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], asking to be allowed to build a settlement of their own, just outside [trade_province.GetCapitalName] proper.
translation: 在港口区，穆斯林商人世世代代以来已经逐渐变得司空见惯，我们也习惯了他们和他们的宗教信仰。在[trade_province.GetName]区的港口，特别是[trade_province.GetCapitalName]本地，这些商人已经平常到成为城市人口的完整组成部分。\n最近，一部分商人觐见了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，请求建立他们自己的定居地，完全独立于[trade_province.GetCapitalName]之外。

original: Only good can come from this.
translation: 这样只会带来好处。

original: No, they must remain where we can control them.
translation: 不，他们必须呆在便于我们控制的地方。

original: [converter_country.Religion.GetName] Missionaries
translation: [converter_country.Religion.GetName]传教士

original: A group of Muslim missionaries have settled down in [trade_province.GetName] to found a new community there for themselves and their converts. They are cooperating with local authorities and do not oppose our rule, but their presence will likely lead to their religion spreading more quickly into the entire area.
translation: 一群穆斯林传教士在[trade_province.GetName]为自己和信徒建立了新的社区。他们与当地权贵合作，并没有违反我们的法律，但他们的存在可能使他们的宗教更快地传入整个地区。

original: We cannot let authority slip to outside groups such as this one.
translation: 我们不能让权力流入这样的外来群体中去。

original: They will be a welcome addition to our society.
translation: 欢迎他们成为我们社会的一部分。

original: Muslim Sailors
translation: 穆斯林水手

original: From the Yellow sea to the Indian Ocean there’s an abundance of ships, from small dhows to great galleys, constantly sailing between the many ports. Taken together this trade network provides goods and supplies for more than half of the world's population.\nWhat many of these galleys have in common is that they are manned by Muslim sailors. These are sailors from Africa or the Middle East joined by converted locals.
translation: 为数众多的船只充斥着从黄海到印度洋的航线，大小帆船巡回于诸港口之间。它们形成的贸易网络为世界上一半的人口提供了商品和给养。\n而其中许多大帆船的共同点，是它们由穆斯林水手驾驶。他们都是来自非洲和中东的皈依地区的海员。

original: Let us encourage these sailors to seek out our ports!
translation: 让我们鼓励这些水手来到我们的港口！

original: We have no need of foreign faiths on our ships.
translation: 我们的船上不需要外国信仰。

original: Miracle
translation: 奇迹

original: A learned man from a faraway land is said to have cured a local princess in [cured_province.GetName] from a harsh illness. The locals are all very impressed and have chosen to adopt the faith of this Molla so that his God can protect them in the times to come.
translation: 据说在[cured_province.GetName]，一个远方来的有识之士治好了当地一位公主的顽疾。当地人深受触动，决定接受这个莫拉的信仰，今后得到他信仰的神的保护。

original: This is a good sign.
translation: 这是个好兆头。

original: Let us invite this man to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], where he can be put to good use.
translation: 让我们邀请这个人来 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，发挥他的才干。

original: Mosque built in [mosque_province.GetName]
translation: [mosque_province.GetName]新建的清真寺

original: The Muslims of [mosque_province.GetName] have constructed a new Mosque to serve as their house of worship. The Mosque is the new clear center of the community and will likely attract greater numbers to settle here. It will also facilitate local conversion of the entire area.\nThere is clear indication that the new Mosque is in part being funded by the many [converter_country.GetAdjective] traders active in the region, and in our government some worry that this might lead to undue influence for them and their religion.
translation: [mosque_province.GetName]的穆斯林新建了一个清真寺作为礼拜点。这个清真寺是新的社区中心，很可能吸引大量人群定居此地。这也将促进整个地区的传教。\n有明显的迹象表明，这个新的清真寺是由许多活跃的[converter_country.GetAdjective]商人资助，所以在政府里，一些人担心这会导致他们和他们的宗教得到过度的影响力。

original: We cannot allow this.
translation: 我们不能容许这种事的发生。
