original: Let us provide them with the support they need to build a better community.
translation: 给予他们支持，建立一个更好的社区。

original: Sultan of [Root.GetName]?
translation: [Root.GetName]的苏丹？

original: With Islam increasingly becoming the dominant religion of our country many of our government officials, nobles and other notables, have begun to adopt Islamic notions of kingship, Arabic names and titles. Many have in fact started to refer to [Root.Monarch.GetName] as a Sultan, even though our official state religion is still [Root.Religion.GetName]. Some advisors of [Root.Monarch.GetName] now suggest that it might be prudent to go along with this. If we start referring to our own country as a sultanate it might easen relations with the many Muslim countries around the world.
translation: 随着伊斯兰逐渐成为我国的主导宗教，许多达官贵人和社会名流都开始采用伊斯兰和阿拉伯的名称和头衔。实际上，许多人已经开始把[Root.Monarch.GetName]称为苏丹，尽管我们的官方国教依然是 [Root.Religion.GetName]。[Root.Monarch.GetName] 的一些顾问认为不妨泰然受之。如果开始确立伊斯兰君主的地位，我们将更容易和世界上众多穆斯林国家搞好关系。

original: I like the idea.
translation: 我喜欢这个主意。

original: No, we must defend the traditional values of the [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.GovernmentName]!
translation: 不，我必须守卫[Root.GetAdjective][Root.GovernmentName]的传统价值观。

original: Joining the Community of the Faithful
translation: 加入信仰社区

original: As [Root.Religion.GetName] is now the official religion of [Root.GetName] we have joined the community of the Faithful. Though some remaining traditionalists lament this change, many more of our Muslim subjects now rejoice over the just rule of [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 随着[Root.Religion.GetName]成为[Root.GetName]的官方信仰，我们加入了信仰社区。尽管还有一些传统观念的人哀叹这一改变，但更多的穆斯林人民都因[Root.Monarch.GetName]的合法统治而欢欣鼓舞。

original: Long live the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]万岁！

original: Traveling Scholar
translation: 旅游学者

original: A learned man from a faraway land has arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. He claims to have studied under scholars in many famous cities, from the great cities of Hind to Mecca, Baghdad and Cairo. He is versed in the politics of the greater Islamic world as well as in intricate matters of theology.
translation: 一个远方来的有识之士到达了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。他号称曾在许多著名城市游学，包括信德、麦加、巴格达、开罗。他通晓伊斯兰世界的政治和复杂的宗教事务。

original: We have use of this man. Let us offer him a place at our court!
translation: 任用这个人。在宫廷中为他留一席之地!

original: Let us learn as much as we can about the state of things abroad.
translation: 让我们尽可能多地了解国外局势。

original: Muslim Chiefs
translation: 穆斯林酋长

original: In the [Root.GetAdjective] hinterlands many chiefs rule their own little domains with little interference from central rule. However, even though they lack the ability to project much power some do have greater ambitions. Some local chiefs in [hinterland_province.GetName] have given name to greater pretensions by starting to style themselves sultans and trying to claim legitimacy by converting their population to Islam.
translation: 在[Root.GetAdjective]内地，许多首领统治着自己的领地，几乎不受中央影响。然而，一些酋长能力虽然不大，野心却不小。一些[hinterland_province.GetName]的本地首领开始以苏丹自居，并试着通过伊斯兰化民众来让自己合法化。

original: Ridiculous.
translation: 可笑。

original: Islamic Syncretism
translation: 伊斯兰融合

original: An increasingly common sight in the [Root.GetAdjective] countryside is that of traveling Sufis, mystic missionaries of the Islamic faith. They are often warmly received not only by their brothers in faith, but also by the rural population who have found a way to integrate the Islamic creed into their own traditions and myths. The result is not something that would fit in Mecca or Cairo but has made many more predisposed towards Islam in general.
translation: 在[Root.GetAdjective]乡间，伊斯兰神秘主义的苏菲派教士四处游历，成为常见景象。他们不仅被教中兄弟接纳，而且被乡下人接受，还将伊斯兰教义融入他们的传统和神话。这样的事并不会发生在麦加或开罗，但依然促进了国家总体上对伊斯兰教的倾向。

original: We must protect the faith of our ancestors!
translation: 我们必须保护先祖的信仰！

original: What harm can these men do.
translation: 他们能造成什么损害。

original: Muslim Refugees
translation: 穆斯林难民

original: A number of refugees from a distant war has arrived on our coasts. They are led by Islamic sheikhs and claim that if we just allow them some unclaimed land they will create a prospering settlement for themselves and lead productive lives as our subjects.
translation: 从遥远战争逃来的一群难民到达了我们的海岸。他们由伊斯兰酋长领导，声称只要我们给他们一些无归属权的土地，他们就能建立起繁荣的殖民地，作为我们的子民引领生产生活。

original: I have just the spot in mind…
translation: 正有此意……

original: They ought to be able to find sanctuary somewhere else.
translation: 他们应该能在其他地方找到避难所。

original: Religious Center
translation: 宗教中心

original: Center of Reformation
translation: 改革中心

original: Center of Reformation
translation: 改革中心

original: §YInvite a Scholar§!
translation: §Y邀请一位学者§!

original: Inviting a Scholar from another country will give us a unique bonus for 20 years.
translation: 从国外邀请一位学者将在20年内带来额外收益。

original: §RThis Trading Policy can only be active for one nation in this Node and is already selected by §!$BY|Y$§R.§!
translation: §R这个贸易政策只能对节点中的一个国家有效，当前被选择的是§!$BY|Y$§R。§!

original: §YYearly Gain:§!\n$MODIFIER$
translation: §Y每年获得：§!\n$MODIFIER$

original: §YImmediate Gain:§!\nRecruit General: §G+1%§!\nRecruit Mercenary: §R-0.15%§!
translation: §Y立即获得：§!\n征召将领：§G+1%§!\n征召雇佣兵：§R-0.15%§!

original: Unruly Tribes
translation: 不守规矩的部落

original: The local tribes in this area are unhappy that their deeds to support the ruler hasn't been rewarded to their preference.
translation: 这个地区的部落不高兴，因为他们支持统治者的功绩没有得到回报。

original: Disfavored Clan
translation: 不受支持的氏族

original: We have limited the influence of a local clan from this area, despite the great amount of informal power they have been able to amass recently.
translation: 我们限制了这个地区一个氏族的影响力，尽管他们能在最近聚集起庞大的非正式力量。

original: Favored Clan
translation: 受支持的氏族

original: We have favored a rising clan in this area to the detriment of others.
translation: 我们在这个地区扶持起了一个新兴氏族，损害了其他氏族的利益。

original: Urban Areas Protected
translation: 受保护的城市地区

original: We have reined in our local tribal collectors in this area to protect the privileges of the local urbanites.
translation: 我们控制了当地部落的征税人，以保护当地市民的特权。

original: Over-Exploited Cities
translation: 过度剥削的城市

original: Local clans have perhaps been a bit too greedy when extracting revenue from the local city population in this province.
translation: 当地氏族在榨取本省人口的税收时，或许有点太贪婪了。

original: Religious Heterodoxy
translation: 宗教异端

original: Local tribesmen have become enamoured by a charismatic shiekh. We have made this man an official at our court and he now takes up revenue from the area.
translation: 当地部落青年受到一个极具个人魅力的谢赫的吸引。我们授予此人官职，现在他负责从这个地区抽税。

original: Religious Unrest
translation: 宗教叛乱

original: A local shiekh is propagating against our rule in this area.
translation: 一个谢赫正在当地鼓动叛乱。

original: Religious Fervor
translation: 宗教热情

original: Our tribesmen have been inspired by a neighboring religious sect. This inspiration instills courage in them, making our armies even more fearsome.
translation: 我们的部落受到邻省教派激励。部落人民被逐渐灌输了勇气，让我们的军队更加令人生畏。

original: Divided Loyalties
translation: 分裂的忠诚

original: The tribesmen in this province serve two masters. Both the tribal council that are their nominal rulers, and the religious leaders of a feudal theocracy.
translation: 这个省的人民侍奉两个主人，分别是名义上的统治者——部落理事会，以及封建神权的宗教领袖。

original: Religious Propaganda
translation: 宗教宣传

original: A neighboring feudal theocracy is spreading propaganda among our tribesmen, trying to sow disunity and to shatter the allegience of our federates.
translation: 一个邻省的宗教神权正在我们的部落中扩大宣传，试图散播分裂的种子，破坏我们联邦的同盟。

original: Strong National Clan
translation: 强大的国家氏族

original: While it has a weak presence here, this area is ruled by a clan that has a strong presence throughout its tribal federation.
translation: 尽管存在感稀薄，但这个地区是由一个影响力遍及整个部落联邦的强大氏族所统治。

original: Strong Local Clan
translation: 强大的本地氏族

original: This area has been entrusted to a strong local clan to rule, much to the ire of stronger clans on the national level.
translation: 这个地区被委托于一个本地的强大氏族管理，极大地激怒了在国家层面上更强大的氏族。

original: Caravan Raids
translation: 商队劫掠

original: Caravan Raids
translation: 商队劫掠

original: Caravan Raids in foreign controlled territory has hurt the distribution of our local trade goods, which in turn has had a negative effect on the local economy here.
translation: 在国外控制地区的商队袭击，损害了我们本地贸易商品的经销，反过来不利于本地经济发展。

original: Rooting out Raiders
translation: 清扫劫掠者

original: We are currently on a campaign to root out local raiders so that we can protect the caravan routes in this area.
translation: 我们正在发兵去扫清本地劫掠者，以保护这个地区的商路。

original: Caravans Protected by Raiders
translation: 受劫掠者保护的商队

original: Rather than spending time on a long campaign to root out caravan raiders we have begun to pay the raiders to protect trade caravans in this region. An expensive but efficient solution.
translation: 相比于花时间进行长期战斗扫清劫掠者，我们转而付钱给劫掠者，让他们保护这个地区的商队。一个昂贵但行之有效的解决方法。

original: Columbian Exchange
translation: 哥伦布交换

original: Clans of [clan_province.GetName]
translation: [clan_province.GetName]的氏族。

original: The [clan_province.GetName] clans have long supported the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and they are a pillar of our federation. In return however they expect that their home region of [clan_province.GetName] and its people will be given priority when the spoils are divided and when we assign important offices.
translation: [clan_province.GetName]的氏族长期支持[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的统治，并且是我们政府的忠实拥趸。但是相对的，他们也希望自己的家乡，[clan_province.GetName]在战乱中被优先保护，并在我们分配重要办事处时获得优先权。

original: It is time that we show our gratitude.
translation: 是时候表达我们的感激之情了。

original: Favors have to be earned.
translation: 我们有必要积累人情。

original: Plight of the citizens of [urban_province.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的困境。

original: The city council of [urban_province.GetCapitalName] have approached us asking for our help. They claim that the clansmen have been placing undue tax burdens on them, as well as taking an unreasonable amount of their land for grazing. They now reach out to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] hoping to be given a more fair treatment.
translation: [urban_province.GetCapitalName]的市议会前来请求我们的裁决。他们声称当地氏族在令其负担过度税收的同时，强取了许多土地用以放牧。[urban_province.GetCapitalName]的市议会希望得到 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]更为公正的待遇。

original: We will not interfere in local politics.
translation: 我们将不会干预本地的政事。

original: Let us restrain the Clan Leaders.
translation: 让我们压制本地的氏族领袖。

original: Rising Clan Leader
translation: 崛起的氏族领袖

original: The power balance in our federation frequently shifts as able individuals and clans prove themselves and gain influence through their courage and cunning in war or raiding. The area of [clan_area.GetAreaName] has recently seen the rise of one such new clan, with its leader now demanding a place on the council of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 由于不断有有能力的个人或氏族在战争或入侵中证明自己，我们国家的权力平衡频繁变化。[clan_area.GetAreaName]最近就崛起了这样一个氏族，他们希望在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的议会之中某得一席之地。

original: Let us make room for this man!
translation: 我们可以为这个人腾出空间!

original: He can serve us better in the field.
translation: 他更适合成为一位将领。

original: We must protect the privileges of the traditional leading clans.
translation: 我们必须保护本地传统氏族领袖的权益。

original: Influential Sheikh
translation: 富有影响力的酋长

original: A local Sufi order in [sufi_came_from_here.GetName] has come to gain great popularity among the local tribesmen. This newfound fervor has lead to a growing sense of unity and fervor among our warriors in the area, who are greatly taken in by this charismatic mysticism.
translation: 一位来自[sufi_came_from_here.GetName]本地的塔里卡在当地部落中获得了极大的追捧。这股新的热潮促成了被这富有感染力的神秘主义洗礼的本土战士们的统一感和极大的热诚。

original: Let us invite him to the council of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]!
translation: 邀请他来我在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的议会！

original: This is an affront to all that is proper.
translation: 这是对一切合理事物的冒犯！

original: Religious Fervor
translation: 宗教热情

original: The tribes of [tribal_religion_province.GetName] have been enamoured by the charismatic preachers of the [neighboring_feudal_theocracy.GovernmentName] of [neighboring_feudal_theocracy.GetName]. As many parts of our federation this area was always religiously heterogeneous, but this turn of events worry the council of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 来自[tribal_religion_province.GetName]的部落们迷上了来自[neighboring_feudal_theocracy.GetName]的[neighboring_feudal_theocracy.GovernmentName]的一位有魅力的传教士。虽然如我们国家的许多地区一样，[tribal_religion_province.GetName]充斥着异端和异教徒，但是这些时间还是使我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的议会感到十分忧虑。

original: We cannot allow the [neighboring_feudal_theocracy.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] dynasty such influence in our lands.
translation: 我们不能让[neighboring_feudal_theocracy.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族对我们的领地拥有如此大的影响力。

original: Surely religious conviction will only increase the ferocity of our warriors?
translation: 宗教信仰一定只会让我们的战士们更加勇猛吧？

original: Dividing the Spoils
translation: 划分战利品

original: Traditionally when integrating new lands the right to tax certain areas or use their pastures for grazing is divided among those of our leading clans who helped during recent wars. There are however two clans vying for the rights to the prestigious [clan_province.GetAreaName] state. One has served us well for many years but does not actually have much of a presence in the area. The other has a strong local presence but is otherwise without much influence and power in our federation.
translation: 按照过去的惯例，当吞并新领地时，在当地征税或获取当地牧场用以放牧的权利会被在战争中处理最多的氏族们瓜分。但是现在有两个令人尊敬的氏族在争夺[clan_province.GetAreaName]这块领地。其中一个氏族为我们服务多年，但是在当地并没有多少影响力，另一个则在当地拥有很高的声望，但是在我们的政府中没有太大的影响力。

original: Let us trust the local abilities.
translation: 相信当地人的能力。

original: We must support our old friends.
translation: 我们必须支持我们的老朋友们。

original: The Royal Family
translation: 皇室

original: From the highest to the lowest parts of [Root.GetAdjective] society, personal authority is paramount to any form of power. The [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family name may command great respect but [Root.Monarch.GetName] is far from the only candidate to rule our clan, let alone the federation.\nTribesmen in [revolt_province.GetAreaName] have convinced one of [Root.Monarch.GetName]s relatives that now is the time to strike to secure his own succession.
translation: 在[Root.GetAdjective]的社会之中，不论是高官显贵还是布衣百姓，个人实力都是获取权力的最优途径。 [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]的族名可能备受尊敬， 但是[Root.Monarch.GetName]绝不是我们氏族，更不用说我们国家的领袖的唯一竞选者。\n[revolt_province.GetAreaName]的部落民们说服了[Root.Monarch.GetName]的一名族人，现在是他争夺氏族和国家继承权的最好时机。

original: Rebels will be crushed!
translation: 叛军定会被粉碎!

original: Stolen [fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: 被偷窃的[fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood]

original: A caravan carrying [fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] has been ambushed by tribes in [ambush_province.GetName]. It appears a local clan feels their lawful tax collection on our behalf is not enough to survive on. Instead they have taken it upon themselves to increase their income through violent means.\nThe royal council is divided among those who feel we must strike down on the bandits to ensure safe passage for the traders, and those who feel we should start paying these tribesmen to protect the caravans.
translation: 一支贩卖[fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]的商队在[ambush_province.GetName]被当地的部落袭击了。这看起来似乎是因为他们觉得他们依法征收的税金不足以另他们继续生存，于是选择了以暴力手段增加自己的收入。\n我们议会的议员们对此有两种不同的想法，一部分议员认为我们必须严惩这些盗匪以靖商路，另一部分则认为我们应该像这些部落民们发放补偿金来使他们不继续袭击商路。

original: We must root out the raiders.
translation: 我们必须铲除这些入侵者。

original: Pay the protection money.
translation: 缴纳保护费

original: Stolen [fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood]
translation: 被偷窃的[fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood]

original: It appears the [From.GetAdjective] cannot police their own clans. A caravan carrying [fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW] has been ambushed by tribes in [ambush_province.GetName]. The local authorities claim that they are going to handle the situation, but for now the effect has been a sharp decrease in profit for our local traders.
translation: 看起来[From.GetAdjective]无法监管自己的氏族。一支贩卖[fancy_trade_caravan_origin.GetFancyTradeGood_LOW]的商队在[ambush_province.GetName]被当地的部落袭击了。当地政权声称他们会采取措施，但是就现在来说，我们在当地的商业利益遭到锐减。

original: Outrageous!
translation: 岂有此理!!

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s Honor Guard
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的荣誉卫队

original: There are many informal ways for the clans in our federation to show their influence. A position in the royal council is certainly one, as is command of armies or the right to tax specific provinces. One of the foremost honors a clan can be bestowed however is a position on the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]’s honor guard. Any influential clan would be expected to have representatives among the rulers personal kawass but there is only need of so many guards for one man. In some ways this is an idea at odds with the goal of actually protecting the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 我们国家的氏族有许多途径来彰显他们的影响力，而由于其征召士兵及收税的权利，一个我们皇家议会中的议员职位正是这些途径中的一种。然而对于一个氏族来说，最能彰显荣耀的职位莫过于一个[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的荣誉卫队的职位。任何一个有影响力的氏族都想要获得一个能在君主面前露脸的职位，但是荣誉卫队的人员编制是固定的，这在某种程度上与保证[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]安全的目标有些许冲突。

original: Let us expand the honor guard.
translation: 让我们扩建荣誉卫队的编制吧。

original: We need men of ability, not more meaningless ceremony.
translation: 我们需要有能力的人，而非毫无意义的祭典。

original: The Tribes of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的部落

original: The local tribes of [Root.GetName] are impressed by our advancing armies and have approached us asking to join our federation directly. In exchange they ask that their old privileges be respected and that they’re given an equal standing to other tribes in the area under our control.\nHowever, the tribal council might take issue with their own influence being diluted, if we should agree.
translation: [Root.GetName]当地的部落被我们先进的军队所打动，开始接触我们寻求直接加入我们的联盟。作为交换他们要求我们尊重他们过去的特权，以及给予他们我们治下土地内其他部落同等的地位。\n如果我们要同意的话，部落议会则会因为他们自己的权势被稀释持反对立场。

original: Let us welcome them to the family.
translation: 让我们欢迎他们加入我们的家庭。

original: Once there is peace they will have to compete with all other local potentates.
translation: 一旦和平降临那里， 他们就必须与本地的当权者竞争了。

original: The Tribes of [From.GetName]
translation: [From.GetName]的部落

original: The treacherous tribes of The Tribes of [From.GetName] have abandoned us and joined our enemies. Their cowardice will earn them no friends once the war is over.
translation: 来自[From.GetName]的奸诈的部落们抛弃了我们并加入了我们的敌人们。他们的怯懦在战后不会给他们带来任何的益处

original: Their names shall forever live in infamy!
translation: 他们的名字应当永存于世！

original: The Tribes of [tribal_religion_province.GetName]
translation: [tribal_religion_province.GetName]的部落

original: The Tribesmen of [tribal_religion_province.GetName] have been impressed by our charismatic preachers and would likely be more than willing to join our [Root.GovernmentName]...
translation: [tribal_religion_province.GetName]当地的部落民们被我们富有魅力的传教士所打动，并且希望加入我们的[Root.GovernmentName]……

original: God is good.
translation: 真主至上！

original: We have gained a §GCore§! on §Y[tribal_religion_province.GetName]§!.
translation: 我们在§Y[tribal_religion_province.GetName]§!获得了一个§G核心§!。

original: Assign Pasha
translation: 分配给帕夏

original: Remove Pasha
translation: 收回帕夏土地

original: §YAssign Pasha§!
translation: §Y分配给帕夏§!

original: §YRemove Pasha§!
translation: §Y收回帕夏土地§!

original: Assigning a Pasha in $STATE|Y$ will give us the following effects:\n$EFFECT$
translation: 将$STATE|Y$分配给帕夏会给予我们以下效果：\n$EFFECT$

original: Removing the Pasha in $STATE|Y$ will give us the following effects:\n$EFFECT$
translation: 收回帕夏土地$STATE|Y$会给予我们以下效果：\n$EFFECT$

original: Assign Pasha
translation: 分配给帕夏

original: Assigning a Pasha in $STATE|Y$ will give us the following effects:\n$EFFECT$
translation: 委任帕夏管制$STATE|Y$会给予我们以下效果：\n$EFFECT$

original: Remove Pasha
translation: 收回帕夏土地

original: Removing the Pasha in $STATE|Y$ will give us the following effects:\n$EFFECT$
translation: 收回帕夏土地$STATE|Y$会给予我们以下效果：\n$EFFECT$

original: Pasha Removed
translation: 帕夏土地被收回

original: Pasha in State
translation: 帕夏控制省份

original: Conform to Template
translation: 遵照模板

original: Select an Army Template to conform this Army to that Template.\nRegiments not matching the Template will be detached into a new Army and missing Regiments will be built, moved and merged with this Army.
translation: 选择一个军队模版来让这支军队遵照那个模版。\n与模版不匹配的军团会分离成新的军队，而缺少的军团则将被征募，移动最终被并入这支军队。

original: Select a Navy Template to conform this Navy to that Template.\nShips not matching the Template will be detached into a new Fleet and missing Ships will be built, moved and merged with this Navy.
translation: 选择一个海军模版来让这支海军遵照那个模版。\n与模版不匹配的船只会分离成新的舰队，而缺少的船只则将被建造，移动最终被并入这支海军。

original: §RThis Army can currently not be Conformed to any Template.§!\nThe Army is currently rented as Condottieri.
translation: §R目前这支军队不能转换成任何模板。§!\n这支军队目前被雇佣

original: §RThis Army can currently not be Conformed to any Template.§!\nThe Army is currently offered as Condottieri.
translation: §R目前这支军队不能转换成任何模板。§!\n这支军队目前被雇佣

original: §RYou must first create an Army Template in the Production Interface's Land Units tab.§!
translation: §R首先你必须在制造界面的陆地单位表单中创建一个军队模版。§!

original: §RYou must first create a Navy Template in the Production Interface's Naval Units tab.§!
translation: §R首先你必须在制造界面的海军单位表单中创建一个海军模版。§!

original: §RThis Army can currently not be Conformed to any Template.§!\nPlease check that you have enough ¤ and £icon_manpower£.
translation: §R这支军队目前不能遵照任何模版。§!\n请确认你拥有足够的¤和£icon_manpower£。

original: §RThis Navy can currently not be Conformed to any Template.§!\nPlease check that you have enough ¤ and £icon_sailors£.
translation: §R这支军队目前不能遵照任何模版。§!\n请确认你拥有足够的¤和£icon_sailors£。

original: Rebels Crushed
translation: 叛军被击败

original: A recent rebellion was violently crushed.
translation: 最近有一股叛军被暴力的摧毁了。

original: Placated Local Population
translation: 安抚本地民众

original: We have averted a recent rebellion by attempting to remedy the discrimination of the locals.
translation: 通过化解当地人的歧视，我们避免了最近一场叛乱。

original: Tarh
translation: 塔尔赫

original: We are forcing the people of this province to buy local products, and to pay a price we have set. This has ensured that we are not losing money directly on our royal monopolies but it has also resulted in a general drop of productivity and quality.
translation: 我们正在强制这个省份的人民以我们设定的价格购买当地的产品。这保证了我们在王室垄断中不再直接损失金钱，但是这也导致了生产率与生产质量的普遍下滑。

original: Unprofitable Monopolies
translation: 无利可图的垄断

original: The production in this province is controlled through royal monopolies, but the demand for the goods being produced has gone down significantly lately, resulting in a loss of profit for us.
translation: 这个省份的生产被王室所垄断，但是生产出来的商品的需求最近却大幅下滑，导致了我们的亏损。

original: Factionalism
translation: 派系之争

original: Our ruler is trying to play the factions in our country off against each other to increase his own control over them.
translation: 我们的统治者试图挑起派系之争来巩固自己对于他们的控制。

original: Ruler Supporting Faction
translation: 统治者支持派系

original: Our ruler is trying to always be on the strongest side in the factional conflicts in our country.
translation: 我们的统治者总是试图在国内派系矛盾中站在强势者的一边。

original: Expanding the Markets of Cairo
translation: 扩建开罗的市场

original: Our sultan has decreed that the market districts of Cairo should be the foremost priority for any renovation or building projects in his time.
translation: 我们的苏丹已经命令要求将开罗的市场区域作为他统治时代中最优先的翻新与建造项目。

original: Renovation of the Slums of Cairo
translation: 整修开罗的贫民窟

original: All building efforts of our current ruler are going to combat povery and sickness in the slums of Cairo.
translation: 我们当今统治者的所有建设的心血，都应该用于与开罗贫民窟中的贫穷与疾病作斗争。

original: Patronization of al-Azhar
translation: 赞助艾兹哈尔

original: Considerable properties have been granted as charitable donations to support the mosques of Cairo in general and the venerable al-Azhar in particular.
translation: 大量的财产被慷慨地捐赠给了开罗的清真寺作为资助，特别是珍贵的艾兹哈尔清真寺。

original: Citadel of Cairo
translation: 开罗的要塞

original: We have spent considerable effort to renovate the Citadel of Cairo as well as building and repairing defenses wherever needed.
translation: 我们已经花费了大量的心血来翻新开罗的要塞，并且修补了所有受需要的防御工事。

original: Monuments of Cairo
translation: 开罗的纪念碑

original: We have devoted most of our resources in the ancient city of Cairo to building monuments to the greatness of our ruler.
translation: 我们已经献出了开罗古城中绝大部分的资源来建造一个彰显我们统治者的伟大的纪念碑。

original: Mamluk Amir al-Hajj
translation: 马穆鲁克埃米尔哈吉

original: We have given one of our most trusted Mamluks the task of guarding the caravans to the holy cities. As there are no warriors as skilled as our own kind the caravans should be safe. Even if he lacks knowledge of the local landscape and population.
translation: 我们已经将保卫前往圣城的队伍的任务交给了一位我们最信任的马穆鲁克。既然这世上没有比我们自己更加娴熟的战士，尽管他缺少对当地风土人情的了解，这支朝觐队伍也应该很安全。

original: Diplomatic Amir al-Hajj
translation: 外交家埃米尔哈吉

original: Our Amir al-Hajj, the official in charge of the yearly pilgrimages to Mecca, has been chosen from among our best diplomats. This should make him well suited for leading the vital caravans through sometimes dangerous territories.
translation: 我们的埃米尔哈吉，每年前往麦加朝觐的管理者，是从我们的最优秀的外交家中选出的。他肯定非常适合带领这支至关重要的队伍穿过有时非常危险的土地。

original: Warrior Amir al-Hajj
translation: 战士埃米尔哈吉

original: Our Amir al-Hajj, the official in charge of the yearly pilgrimages to Mecca, has been chosen from among our best military leaders. This should make him well suited for leading the defense of these vital caravans.
translation: 我们的埃米尔哈吉，每年前往麦加朝觐的管理者，是从我们的最优秀的军官中选出的。他肯定非常适合指挥这些至关重要的队伍的防御。

original: Bedouin Amir al-Hajj
translation: 贝都因人埃米尔哈吉

original: Our Amir al-Hajj, the official in charge of the yearly pilgrimages to Mecca, has been chosen among the bedouin tribesmen who would normally pose a threat to the very caravans we would have him protect. This should make him uniquely well suited to protect the caravans, but can also be seen as a neglect of our sacred duty by some.
translation: 我们的埃米尔哈吉，每年前往麦加朝觐的管理者，是从贝都因人的部落中选出的，而这些贝都因的部落恰恰经常给他保护的队伍带来威胁。这让他成为保护队伍独一无二的人选，但也在某种程度上被视为我们在玩忽职守。

original: Commander from the Awlad al-nas
translation: 来自人民之子的指挥官

original: The defense of [Root.GetName] has been left in the hands of enterprising Awlad al-Nas, the sons of manumitted mamluks.
translation: 有魄力的人民之子们接管了[Root.GetName] 的防务，他们全都出身于当年被解放的马穆鲁克家庭。

original: Mamluk Commander
translation: 马穆鲁克指挥官

original: The defense of this area is in the hands of one of our most trusted Mamluks.
translation: 我们最信任的马穆鲁克们接管了此地的防务。

original: Qaranis
translation: 前任苏丹的马穆鲁克

original: Various officials put in power by our predecessors remain in their offices. This is making the period of transition less stable than many would have liked.
translation: 很多前朝老臣仍手握各自部门大权，这使得权力交接期的政权隐隐有些不稳。

original: Loyal Mamluks
translation: 忠诚的马穆鲁克们

original: We have replaced the Mamluks put in power by our predecessors with loyal freshly bought Mamluks. This has earned us few friends among the households of Cairo but at least we know that we can trust our officers now.
translation: 我们用忠诚的新一代马穆鲁克取代了先王的拥护者，尽管这将导致我们在开罗的世家中被孤立，但至少我们确信新任官员们都是值得信赖的

original: Mamluk Succession
translation: 马穆鲁克的继承

original: The death of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has left our country without a ruler. All the important Mamluk households of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are calling upon their influence to have a say in who his successor is going to be. Depending on who wins our new ruler will have the support of different households and different parts of the country.\nOnly one thing is certain, those that would rather have seen their own group's interests prevailing will not greet our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with joy. Some might even spend the rest of their lives trying to limit his influence.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]之死让我们的国家群龙无首，所有具有影响力的马穆鲁克世家都被召集到首都[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]商议谁将是国家的继承者。不论来自哪个地区的马穆鲁克世家成为我们的新统治者，有一件事是可以肯定的：那些拥戴其他候选人的马穆鲁克并不会为了诚心的为了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的登基而欢呼，他们中的有些人甚至会穷尽自己的余生去抑制新苏丹的影响。

original: We need the support of the [first_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName] Mamluks.
translation: 我们需要支持来自[first_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName]的马穆鲁克们。

original: Only the [second_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName] Mamluks are of use now.
translation: 现在，只有[second_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName] 的马穆鲁克们是对我们有用的。

original: The [third_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName] candidate has our support!
translation: [third_ruler_alternative_province.Culture.GetName]的候选人获得了我们的支持。

original: The best alternative is one who has no ties to the groups in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]...
translation: 最好的的选择是那位与 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]毫无瓜葛的……

original: [not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName] Soldiers
translation: [not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName]的士兵们

original: While Mamluks make up the core of our forces not all of our military might consists of warrior slaves. Local [not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName] soldiers make up much of our infantry and they are also used for guard and garrison duties.\nSmall chances of advancement and low pay aren’t the best motivators however and it is not clear how far we can trust these men. Certainly their training and equipment are often neglected by the Amir in charge of them.\nIn [not_ruling_culture_province.GetAreaName] the mistrust between the [not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName] and Mamluk Amirs have lead to a mutiny.
translation: 尽管马穆鲁克是我们战力的核心，但是我们的军队并不是全部由奴隶战士组成。我们的步兵中有不少当地 [not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName]的士兵，他们还负责护卫与守城职责。\n然而匮乏的晋升机会与低水平的薪水导致缺乏激励，我们还不清楚究竟该多大程度上信任这些士兵。掌管他们的埃米尔经常忽视他们的训练与装备。\n在[not_ruling_culture_province.GetAreaName]，[not_ruling_culture_province.Culture.GetName]人与马穆鲁克埃米尔之间的不信任最终导致了兵变。

original: We must crush this in its cradle!
translation: 我们必须扼杀其于摇篮中!

original: Let us see what we can do to improve their situation.
translation: 让我们瞧瞧该怎样改善他们的处境。

original: The Tarh and the Royal Monopolies
translation: 塔尔赫与王室垄断

original: Our predecessors have wisely used a system of royal monopolies to control the revenue from cash crops and fine goods. With demand falling however we are losing money on these investments. Our overseer in [monopoly_province.GetName] is reporting that they have been unable to sell their stock for two years now and worry that this is going to cost the state money.\nHe suggests that we force our subjects to buy these goods at a set price instead so that we can regain our investment. A process traditionally known as Tarh.
translation: 我们的祖先曾经广泛的使用王室垄断系统来掌控商品谷物与精细货物的收入。然而随着需求的减少，我们在这些投资上不断亏损。我们在[monopoly_province.GetName]的监管者报告说他们已经在两年内无法出售库存了，他们担忧这将导致国库的消耗。\n他建议我们强制国民用给定的价格购买这些商品从而收回投资。这种方式一般称为塔尔赫。

original: What an excellent idea!
translation: 多棒的主意!

original: We will just have to endure the cost.
translation: 我们还是承受开销吧。

original: Revolt of [mamluk_province.Culture.GetName] Amir
translation: [mamluk_province.Culture.GetName]埃米尔的叛乱

original: One of our more powerful Mamluk Amirs has built up a powerbase in [mamluk_province.GetAreaName] and is now marching on [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. There is rumors of widespread support for his cause among the Mamluk households of the capital and even within the citadel itself.
translation: 在我们更加有权势的埃米尔中，有一位在[mamluk_province.GetAreaName]建立了自己的势力并且正向[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]进军。有传闻说他的反叛事业受到首都的马穆鲁克王室的广泛支持，甚至城堡内部也有他的大量支持者。

original: The penalty for treason is death!
translation: 对背叛的惩罚只有死亡！!

original: Factionalism
translation: 派系之争

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is far from the only owner of Mamluks in our [Root.GovernmentName]. The households of influential manumitted Mamluks often contain great, if not greater, numbers of newly imported slaves from their home regions. These influential Amirs are often those with the greatest influence during a succession but even when the throne is occupied the influence of the Mamluk households are great on [Root.GetAdjective] politics. It is up to [Root.Monarch.GetName] to ensure that this factionalism does not stifle the politics of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 我们[Root.GovernmentName]中马穆鲁克的主人不仅仅只有[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]一个。被解放并且影响力显著的马穆鲁克王室中包含大量来自他们故乡的新进口的奴隶。这些拥有影响力的埃米尔在马穆鲁克王位更替时权势达到顶峰，就算王位确认之后他们在[Root.GetAdjective]政局中的影响力依旧显著。现在该让[Root.Monarch.GetName]确保这些派系之争不会扼杀[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的政局了。

original: We must attempt to play them off against each other.
translation: 我们必须在他们之间挑拨离间。

original: Let us pick sides and support the stronger factions.
translation: 让我们选边站队支持更强的派系。

original: Palace Coup
translation: 宫廷政变

original: Gravely discontent with the misrule of [Root.Monarch.GetName], prominent Mamluk Amirs have taken it upon themselves to depose our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and put a more able warrior on the throne.
translation: 由于对于[Root.Monarch.GetName]暴政的强烈不满，大量马穆鲁克埃米尔亲自反对我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]并且推举了一位更加有能力的战士登上王位。

original: We will not abandon [Root.Monarch.GetName]!
translation: 我们不会抛弃[Root.Monarch.GetName]！!

original: All men must die.
translation: 所有人必须死。

original: The City of Cairo
translation: 开罗之城

original: Much older than our own [Root.GovernmentName], Cairo has been embellished by rulers and conquerors for hundreds if not a thousand years. Bringing order in this maze of buildings, from the tombs of the city of the dead and the slums of fustat, to the bustling markets of Khan el-Khalili, or the great Citadel of Cairo itself, has proven a monumental task for many of our predecessors. Nonetheless, as the master of the city, [Root.Monarch.GetName], is expected to leave [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mark upon Cairo, both to embellish and develop it, and to combat disease and keep the order.
translation: 开罗远比我们自己[Root.GovernmentName]更加古老，被无数统治者与征服者所装饰，就算没有一千年也有几百年的历史。列数这些迷宫般的建筑，从亡者的城市坟墓，福斯塔特的贫民区到熙熙攘攘的汗哈利利集市，乃至开罗整个城堡自身，无不证明了我们祖先不朽的杰作。尽管如此，作为城市的主人，[Root.Monarch.GetName]也被期望在开罗留下[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]印记，即是为了装饰与发展开罗，也是为了对抗瘟疫与保持秩序。

original: Let us renovate the souks and the Khan el-Khalili.
translation: 让我们翻新露天市场与汗哈利利集市。

original: We must renovate the growing slums and the suburbs.
translation: 我们必须翻新日渐增长的贫民区与郊区。

original: The Mosques and the al-Azhar require our attention.
translation: 爱兹哈尔清真寺以及其他清真寺需要我们的照看。

original: Let us focus on the citadel itself, and the defenses of the city.
translation: 让我们更关注城堡自身，以及城市的防御。

original: Coming generations shall envy the monuments we erect.
translation: 后代应当嫉妒我们竖起的纪念碑。

original: There is not much we can do for the citizens of Cairo right now.
translation: 我们现在没啥可为开罗市民做的。

original: A New Amir al-Hajj
translation: 一位新的埃米尔哈吉

original: The pilgrimage to the holy cities of Mecca and Medina is one that every Muslim should undertake at least once in their lifetime. As the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] it is our responsibility to ensure that they can safely reach that destination. This is a position that in many ways requires both cunning and martial ability, as the way to proceed can range from defeating raiders to negotiating passage from local rulers, to outright threats or bribery. The Amir al-Hajj will have the overall responsibility for the Hajj caravans and will have great freedom in how to achieve a steady and peaceful passage for all [Root.GetAdjective] pilgrims.
translation: 去圣城麦加与麦地那朝觐是每一个穆斯林一生必须完成至少一次的功修。作为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，保证他们安全地到达目的地是我们的职责。从多个方面讲，这个职位既需要机敏也需要军事才能，因为他的工作方式包括从打败劫掠者，到与当地统治者谈判提供通过路线，无论是完全的威胁亦或是贿赂。埃米尔哈吉（掌管朝觐的埃米尔）将会承担朝觐队伍的全部职责，拥有很大的自由来决定如何为所有[Root.GetAdjective]朝觐者提供一个稳定与安全的路线。

original: Let us choose a bedouin, the best of our own.
translation: 让我们尽我们所能，选择一位贝都因人。

original: Your choice of §YAmir al-Hajj§! will have an effect both on the success rate of the Hajj Caravans of your people as well as the type of impact any problems with the Hajj will have:\nA Bedouin Amir al-Hajj will be able to protect the caravans from dangers that none of the other options could.
translation: 你在§Y埃米尔哈吉§!（掌管朝觐的埃米尔）上的选择将会在你的人民朝觐队伍的成功率上，以及朝觐中产生的问题所带来的影响上具有一定的效果：\n一位贝都因埃米尔阿尔-哈吉能够保护队伍免受危险，而其他的选择都无法做到这一点。

original: Let us choose a bedouin, native to the deserts of Arabia.
translation: 让我们选择一个阿拉伯沙漠当地的贝都因人。

original: A skilled warrior will be up for the task.
translation: 一位出色的战士应该能胜任这项工作。

original: Your choice of §YAmir al-Hajj§! will have an effect both on the success rate of the Hajj Caravans of your people as well as the type of impact any problems with the Hajj will have:\nA Warrior Amir al-Hajj will have a good chance of defending the caravan if it is attacked, but he may also create unnecessary conflicts through his lack of tact.
translation: 你在§Y埃米尔哈吉§!（掌管朝觐的埃米尔）上的选择将会在你的人民朝觐队伍的成功率上，以及朝觐中产生的问题所带来的影响上具有一定的效果：\n一位战士埃米尔哈吉在队伍受到攻击时大概率能保护队伍，但是他也可能因为缺乏策略引起不必要的冲突。

original: An able diplomat will handle this best.
translation: 一位有能力的外交家能够妥善处理这项任务。

original: Your choice of §YAmir al-Hajj§! will have an effect both on the success rate of the Hajj Caravans of your people as well as the type of impact any problems with the Hajj will have:\nA Diplomat Amir al-Hajj will be more efficient when your country is at peace, and less so when you are at war.
translation: 你在§Y埃米尔哈吉§!（掌管朝觐的埃米尔）上的选择将会在你的人民朝觐队伍的成功率上，以及朝觐中产生的问题所带来的影响上具有一定的效果：\n一位外交家埃米尔哈吉在你的国家处于和平状态时更加有效率，但是在你处于战争状态时效率较低。

original: Only a loyal Mamluk can perform this task.
translation: 只有一位忠诚的马穆鲁克才能执行这项任务。

original: Your choice of §YAmir al-Hajj§! will have an effect both on the success rate of the Hajj Caravans of your people as well as the type of impact any problems with the Hajj will have:\nA Mamluk Amir al-Hajj will be more trustworthy when your ruler has high legitimacy, and much less trustworthy when legitimacy is low.
translation: 你在§Y埃米尔哈吉§!（掌管朝觐的埃米尔）上的选择将会在你的人民朝觐队伍的成功率上，以及朝觐中产生的问题所带来的影响上具有一定的效果：\n一位马穆鲁克埃米尔哈吉在你的统治者拥有高正统时更加可靠，但是在正统性低的时候不太值得信任。

original: Hajj Caravans Raided
translation: 朝觐队伍受到袭击

original: A recent caravan of pilgrims for the holy cities was ambushed and plundered. It is our duty to protect those among our subjects who would set out for the holy cities and now our ability to do so is put in question.
translation: 最近一支前往圣城的朝觐队伍遭受了埋伏，并且被洗劫了。这本是我们的责任来保护我们出发前往圣城的国民，但现在我们的这项能力被打上了问号。

original: This will not happen again.
translation: 这样的事情不会再发生了。

original: We must spend more to protect them.
translation: 我们必须花费更多的力气来保护他们。

original: Our Amir al-Hajj will use his contacts to ensure a better outcome in the future.
translation: 我们的埃米尔哈吉将会运用他的关系来保证未来会有更好的结果。

original: The Pilgrims are Safe
translation: 朝觐者安全了

original: Our efforts to protect those of our subjects who seek to perform their pilgrimage to the holy cities of Mecca and Medina have paid off. It is now long since there was last a raid and the realm is at peace.
translation: 我们为保护前往圣城麦加与麦地那朝觐的国民所做出的努力最终收到了回报。上一次的袭击已经是很久以前的事情了，而现在的领地处于和平当中。

original: Excellent.
translation: 太棒了。

original: Awlad al-nas
translation: 阿乌拉德·纳斯

original: Having been educated to be loyal warriors since early age Mamluk slaves often have the complete trust of their owner or employer. Their sons however, the Awlad al-nas, having grown up under far more convenient and forgiving circumstances, are generally considered far less able and loyal. Unable to serve as Royal Mamluks the Awlad al-nas instead constitute a social elite within regular military units and in the lower administration.\nThese noble sons themselves are however continually trying to prove that they are ready for bigger responsibilities. With the open position of command for the defenses of the [defence_province.GetAreaName] state, a number of them are hoping that we will entrust them with this task.
translation: 由于在很小年纪就被忠诚的战士所教育，马穆鲁克奴隶往往被他们的主人或者雇主完全信任。然而他们的儿子们，阿乌拉德·纳斯，在更加方便与宽松的环境下成长，被普遍认为更无能与更缺乏忠诚。这些阿乌拉德·纳斯无法成为王家马穆鲁克，作为替代他们成为了常规军事单位与更低级别的行政机构中的社会精英。\n这些贵族的儿子们仍在不断尝试证明自己能够承担更大的职责。随着指挥[defence_province.GetAreaName]防御事务的职位空缺了出来，他们中的不少人希望我们能够信任他们并且委任他们这项职务。

original: Let us appoint one of the sons.
translation: 让我们指派其中一个公子哥。

original: We can only trust our own, the commander must be a Mamluk.
translation: 我们只能相信我们自己，指挥官必须是一位马穆鲁克。

original: Qaranis
translation: 卡拉尼斯

original: This [Root.GovernmentName] was founded by Mamluk slaves and the ownership and import of skilled warrior slaves remain the base for any [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]’s power. It is only natural that a slave will be more loyal to his master than any other in his new homeland, and even more so if rewarded by manumission for services rendered.\nHowever, currently many of the royal mamluks in our administration, court and armies are those that $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ bought and introduced to our [Root.GovernmentName]. These are men with great influence but no personal loyalties to [Root.Monarch.GetName], men that our new Mamluks accuse of plotting and trying to limit their influence.
translation: [Root.GovernmentName]是由马穆鲁克奴隶建立的，技艺精湛的奴隶战士的进口与所有权依然是所有[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的权利基础。自然而然，一个奴隶在他新的祖国对他的主人要比任何其他人更忠诚，如果以解放作为侍奉的奖励的话，他甚至可以更加忠心耿耿。\n但是最近很多行政机构，法庭与军队中的王家马穆鲁克是由<VAR-RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH>购买并且引荐至我们[Root.GovernmentName]的。这些人拥有很大的权势但是对[Root.Monarch.GetName]没有任何忠诚，我们新的马穆鲁克指控他们在进行密谋并且试图限制他们的影响力。

original: Let us root out the Qaranis from important positions!
translation: 让我们把这些卡拉尼斯从重要的岗位上清除出去！

original: We have no choice but to trust them, we are all Mamluks after all...
translation: 我们除了信任他们别无选择，毕竟大家都是马穆鲁克……

original: Furusiyya
translation: 马术

original: The Furusiyya are a set of equestrian exercises that teach young warriors the craft of cavalry warfare. With detailed rules, training manuals and very popular public competitions and champions, the Furusiyya has in many ways been perfected by Mamluk warrior aristocracy. While some chroniclers would claim that the champions of today could never compete with the warriors of the past, it is still both customary, and very popular, for [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]s to arrange big public Furusiyya competitions, and the champions remain the heroes of many popular tales.
translation: 马术是教育年轻战士骑兵战斗技艺的一系列骑术训练。通过详尽的规则，训练的手册，普及的大众竞技与受欢迎的冠军，马术在各个方面上被马穆鲁克战士的上层贵族所完善。尽管一些史书作家声称当今的冠军永远无法与过去的勇者相提并论，但[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]们举办的公众马术大赛仍然遵从习俗并且广受欢迎，产生的冠军们也依然被广为传颂。

original: This is good for the people, but not something for a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to spend money on.
translation: 这对我们的人民很有好处，但是不值得[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]花钱。

original: Let us expand and build new hippodromes to patronize the flowers of chivalry.
translation: 让我们扩展并建立新的跑马场来浇灌骑士精神的花朵。

original: Furusiyya
translation: 伊斯兰骑士准则

original: We are spending considerable resources on upholding the great traditions of martial competitions for cavalry in the Mamluk state.
translation: 在马穆鲁克境内，我们花费了数量大量钱财来维护骑兵军事竞赛的伟大传统。
